translated: SHRIRAHULA-MADA-ADHISHTHANA SARVASIDDHAM ME PRAYATSA SARVA KARMA SUCA ME CITTA SHRIYAKURU HUM HA HA HA HA HO:

original: de nas badzra mushti zhes bya bas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas badzra mushti zhes bya bas rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, with the vajra fist mudra called vajra fist,

original: aom badzra mushti bam zhes brjod par bya'o //🔽rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong rtse mo bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba ni rdo rje khu @72a * //
analyzed: aom badzra mushti bam zhes brjod par bya'o // rdo rje bsdams pa'i mdzub mo gnyis kyi bar du mthe bong rtse mo bcug la mdzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba ni rdo rje khu @72a * //
translated: one should say OM VAJRA MUDHA BAM.

original: tshur gyi mtshan nyid do //
analyzed: tshur gyi mtshan nyid do //
translated: The two thumbs are inserted between the two vajra-locked forefingers, and the two forefingers are squeezed together. This is the characteristic of the vajra fist.

original: de dag sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par dral bar bya'o //
analyzed: de dag sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgyas sdig pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par dral bar bya'o //
translated: With that, the mudra for extracting evil, one should extract evil just as it is.

original: de nas dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, having formed the pledge mudra of glorious Vairochana and so forth,

original: de'i sngags lan gsum brjod cing aom badzra mu: zhes pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i sngags lan gsum brjod cing aom badzra mu: zhes pas rang gi snying gar dgrol bar bya'o //
translated: one should recite their mantras three times and release it at one's heart with OM VAJRA MUSALA.

original: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la yi ge h'um yid kyis mngon par bris la de nyid yid bzlos shing bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i sems dpa'i rdo rje la yi ge h'um yid kyis mngon par bris la de nyid yid bzlos shing bdag med par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, mentally inscribe the syllable hūṃ on the vajra of the spiritual hero residing in one’s heart, and meditating on selflessness, mentally recite just that [syllable].

original: de nyid las stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du de nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa /
analyzed: de nyid las stong gsum pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du de nyid las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnyis pa /
translated: From that [syllable] arises a moon disk the size of the billion-world universe. On top of that, from that [syllable] arises a second moon disk.

original: yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba las /
analyzed: yang de h'um dang bcas pa las rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba las /
translated: From that [syllable] together with the hūṃ arises a blazing five-pronged vajra.

original: de'i dbus su yang yi ge h'um bkod la de nyid zlos shing /
analyzed: de'i dbus su yang yi ge h'um bkod la de nyid zlos shing /
translated: In the center of that, also, is the syllable hūṃ. Reciting just that [syllable],🔽one should meditate on the pride of the vajra, thinking, “I am just like the spiritual hero, just like the seal, just like that.”

original: sems dpa' ji lta ba'i phyag rgya de bzhin te bdag kyang de bzhin no zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal sgom zhing rdo rje de las de'i rigs thams cad spros la /
analyzed: sems dpa' ji lta ba'i phyag rgya de bzhin te bdag kyang de bzhin no zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal sgom zhing rdo rje de las de'i rigs thams cad spros la /
translated: From that vajra, one should emanate all the families of that [vajra].

original: des gdug pa thams cad btul nas /
analyzed: des gdug pa thams cad btul nas /
translated: With that [vajra], one should subdue all evildoers.

original: de thams cad rdo rje der bcug la /
analyzed: de thams cad rdo rje der bcug la /
translated: All of them should be inserted into that vajra.

original: sems dpar grags pa kun gyi bdag / bdag nyid bdag la yang dag gnas //
analyzed: sems dpar grags pa kun gyi bdag / bdag nyid bdag la yang dag gnas //
translated: truly abides in the self.

original: de bas na badzra ham zhes zlos shing /
analyzed: de bas na badzra ham zhes zlos shing /
translated: Therefore, reciting vajra-ham,

original: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa' bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje bsod zhing badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //🔽yang yi ge h'um zlos shing de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du lhag par mos la /
analyzed: rdo rje de rdo rje sems dpa' bsnyems pa dang bcas pas rdo rje bsod zhing badzra satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o // yang yi ge h'um zlos shing de nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du lhag par mos la /
translated: one should imagine that vajra as the haughty Vajrasattva, and one should recite vajra-satva-ham.

original: ma h'a sa ya satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: ma h'a sa ya satva ham zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Again, reciting the syllable hum, one should imagine that very [vajra] as Humkara, and one should recite maha-satva-ham.

original: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems sgom pa'o //
analyzed: 'di ni thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems sgom pa'o //
translated: This is the meditation on the beginningless and endless mind.

original: de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having formed the mudra of the conqueror of the three realms, one should recite this:

original: sa ma ya ham /
analyzed: sa ma ya ham /
translated: Samaya-ham.

original: 'di yang skur bsgom pa ste /
analyzed: 'di yang skur bsgom pa ste /
translated: This is also the meditation on the body.

original: yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo byin gyis brlabs la /
analyzed: yang khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya de nyid kyis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bo byin gyis brlabs la /
translated: Again, with that very mudra of the conqueror of the three realms, one should bless the heart, forehead, throat, and crown,

original: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya satva aa dhi tishtha sva m'am zhes brjod par bya'o //
translated: Say, Samaya stva adhisthana svam.

original: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then bind the great seal.

original: de nas ma ya aa zhes brjod de mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la /
analyzed: de nas ma ya aa zhes brjod de mdun du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sprul la /
translated: Then, saying maya a, emanate a moon mandala in front.

original: h'um aa zhes bya ba 'dis de'i steng du rdo rje 'bar ba bdag nyid dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um aa zhes bya ba 'dis de'i steng du rdo rje 'bar ba bdag nyid dbab par bya'o //
translated: With hum a, one should cause oneself to descend upon it as a blazing vajra.

original: de nas badzro zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la /
analyzed: de nas badzro zhes rdo rje'i nga rgyal du rnam par bsgoms la /
translated: Then, meditating on the pride of being a vajra with vajro 'ham,

original: rdo rje de nyid badzra h'um ka ro ham /
analyzed: rdo rje de nyid badzra h'um ka ro ham /
translated: recite vajra humkara hom,

original: zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgoms par bya'o //
translated: and meditate on oneself as Vajra Humkara.

original: de nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das khro bo @72b rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nas de nyid du bcom ldan 'das khro bo @72b rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Then, having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled the Bhagavat, the wrathful Vajra Hook, and so forth, form the seal of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds,🔽and recite:

original: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um /🔽grihna grihna h'um /
analyzed: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um / grihna grihna h'um /
translated: Om, sumbha nisumbha hum,🔽grabha grabha hum,

original: grihn'a pa ya grihna'a pa ya h'um /
analyzed: grihn'a pa ya grihna'a pa ya h'um /
translated: grabhanapaya grabhanapaya hum,

original: a'a na ya ho //
analyzed: a'a na ya ho //
translated: Ānayaho.

original: bha ga b'ana badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: bha ga b'ana badzra h'um phat /
translated: Bhagavān vajra hūṃ phaṭ.

original: dri shya zhes pas blta bar bya'o//
analyzed: dri shya zhes pas blta bar bya'o//
translated: Driśya.

original: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas //
analyzed: ye shes sems dpa' de mthong nas //
translated: Having seen that awareness being,

original: rang gi lus la rab tu bsgom //
analyzed: rang gi lus la rab tu bsgom //
translated: one should meditate on it in one’s own body.🔽Having summoned it, having caused it to enter, having bound it,

original: dgug cing bcug la bcing pa dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya //
analyzed: dgug cing bcug la bcing pa dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya //
translated: having brought it under control, one should accomplish it.

original: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes zlos shing shing khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes zlos shing shing khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Reciting “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ,” one should form the mudrā of the lord of the three realms,

original: de nyid dang sa ma ya stvam: zhes brjod cing rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
analyzed: de nyid dang sa ma ya stvam: zhes brjod cing rgyab tu zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
translated: and with that and saying “samaya stvaṃ,” one should generate a moon maṇḍala behind it.

original: de nyid dang sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes brjod de /
analyzed: de nyid dang sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes brjod de /
translated: With that and saying “samaya stvaṃ aham,”

original: der bdag nyid dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: der bdag nyid dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should meditate on oneself as Śrī Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: g-yon brkyang ba yis legs par bzhugs //
analyzed: g-yon brkyang ba yis legs par bzhugs //
translated: One should stand with the left leg straight,

original: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od //
analyzed: 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od //
translated: with a blazing garland of light,

original: shin tu gdul dka' drag po'i lus //🔽g-yon pa'i zhabs kyis yang dag mnan //
analyzed: shin tu gdul dka' drag po'i lus // g-yon pa'i zhabs kyis yang dag mnan //
translated: with a body of fierce, very difficult to subdue,🔽with the left foot pressing down on

original: g-yas pa yis ni au ma yi //
analyzed: g-yas pa yis ni au ma yi //
translated: and the right foot on Umā’s

original: nu ma rgyas pa gnon par bsam //
analyzed: nu ma rgyas pa gnon par bsam //
translated: One should imagine that the full breasts are pressed.

original: spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste //
analyzed: spyan 'bar 'jigs su rung ba ste //
translated: The eyes are blazing and terrifying,🔽The color of a great blue lotus,

original: autpala sngon po chen po'i mdog / rdo rje h'um mdzad bsdus pa yin //
analyzed: autpala sngon po chen po'i mdog / rdo rje h'um mdzad bsdus pa yin //
translated: And are the essence of Vajra Humkara.

original: zhal gdangs mche ba cung zad gtsigs //
analyzed: zhal gdangs mche ba cung zad gtsigs //
translated: The mouth is open and the fangs slightly bared,

original: khro bcas zhal ni bzhad pa yin //
analyzed: khro bcas zhal ni bzhad pa yin //
translated: And the face is smiling with wrath.

original: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
analyzed: zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa //
translated: The four-faced one has eight arms.

original: phyag gnyis kyis ni thugs ka ru //
analyzed: phyag gnyis kyis ni thugs ka ru //
translated: With two of the hands,

original: khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis //
analyzed: khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yis //
translated: At the heart, with the gesture of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds,

original: rdo rje dril bu bsdams par mdzad //🔽phyag gnyis na ni mda' gzhu bsnams //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu bsdams par mdzad // phyag gnyis na ni mda' gzhu bsnams //
translated: He holds a vajra and a bell.🔽In two of the hands he holds a bow and arrow,

original: gnyis na ral gri lcags kyu bsnams //
analyzed: gnyis na ral gri lcags kyu bsnams //
translated: In two a sword and a goad,

original: gnyis na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams //
analyzed: gnyis na rdo rje zhags pa bsnams //
translated: In two a vajra and a noose.

original: sangs rgyas chun 'phyang phreng ba can //
analyzed: sangs rgyas chun 'phyang phreng ba can //
translated: He has a garland of human heads,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phreng //🔽padma rdo rje dar dpyangs kyi //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen phreng // padma rdo rje dar dpyangs kyi //
translated: And a garland of jewels of the Tathagata.

original: dbang bskur dang ldan sna tshogs pa'i //
analyzed: dbang bskur dang ldan sna tshogs pa'i //
translated: He is consecrated with a lotus, vajra, and hanging silk,

original: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa'o //
analyzed: rgyan rnams kun gyis rab brgyan pa'o //
translated: And is adorned with all the various ornaments.

original: yang na kro dha drishti hr'i: zhes bya ba mig tu bkod la /
analyzed: yang na kro dha drishti hr'i: zhes bya ba mig tu bkod la /
translated: Or else, “Krodha-dṛṣṭi-hrīḥ” is placed in the eyes.

original: zhal gcig pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par bya'o //
analyzed: zhal gcig pa khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya dang ldan par bya'o //
translated: One should have one face and the mudrā of the conqueror of the three worlds.

original: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje h'um dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du lce la rdo rje h'um dang bcas par bsam par bya'o //
translated: As before, one should imagine a vajra with hūṃ on the tongue.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po yang ji lta ba bzhin du bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya chen po yang ji lta ba bzhin du bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should bind the great mudrā of the lord’s activity just as it is.

original: de'i rjes la bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de'i rjes la bsdu ba'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: After that, one should bind the gathering mudrā

original: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
translated: and recite “jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.”

original: yid kyi legs pa'i sbyor bas @73a * //
analyzed: yid kyi legs pa'i sbyor bas @73a * //
translated: With the application of the mind,

original: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi lus la sangs rgyas thams cad gzhug par bya ste /
translated: one should cause all the buddhas to enter one’s body.

original: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya ba dang / rang gi sngags kyang len gsum brjod la /
analyzed: badzra dh'a tu dri shya dza: h'um bam ho: sa ma ya stvam sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya ba dang / rang gi sngags kyang len gsum brjod la /
translated: “Vajra-dhātu-dṛśya jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ / samaya stvaṃ / samaya stvaṃ / aham” and one’s own mantra should be recited three times,

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: and one should accomplish the pledge mudrā.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a yo g'i shva ra h'um /
translated: Oṃ sarva tathāgata mahā yoga śvara hūṃ.

original: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngags so //
translated: This is the mantra of the Blessed One Vairocana.

original: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom badzra satva h'um zhes bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i sngags so //
translated: Oṃ vajra sattva hūṃ. This is the mantra of Akṣobhya.

original: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sngags so //🔽aom badzra dharma h'um zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sngags so //
analyzed: aom badzra ratna h'um zhes bya ba ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi sngags so // aom badzra dharma h'um zhes bya ba ni snang ba mtha' yas kyi sngags so //
translated: Oṃ vajra ratna hūṃ. This is the mantra of Ratnasaṃbhava.🔽Oṃ vajra dharma hūṃ. This is the mantra of Amitābha.

original: aom badzra karma h'um zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i sngags so ;
analyzed: aom badzra karma h'um zhes bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i sngags so ;
translated: Oṃ vajra karma hūṃ. This is the mantra of Amoghasiddhi.

original: / de nas de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad de //
analyzed: / de nas de rnams kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bshad de //
translated: Then the pledge seals of those are explained.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i sems ma rdo rje ma bstan par byas la /🔽gung mo gnyis bsgrengs te myu gu ltar mnyam par bsgreng ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i sems ma rdo rje ma bstan par byas la / gung mo gnyis bsgrengs te myu gu ltar mnyam par bsgreng ba ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: Having displayed the mind vajra arisen from the vajra binding,🔽the two middle fingers extended and evenly raised like a sprout is Vairocana’s.

original: gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
analyzed: gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
translated: The two middle fingers placed together inside is Akṣobhya’s.

original: gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis rin po che ltar byas pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
analyzed: gung mo dang mthe bong gnyis rin po che ltar byas pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
translated: The gesture of Ratnasaṃbhava is made by forming a jewel with the thumb and index finger.

original: gung mo padma 'dra bar byas pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //🔽de bzhin du mdzub mo bkug pa ni /
analyzed: gung mo padma 'dra bar byas pa ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o // de bzhin du mdzub mo bkug pa ni /
translated: The gesture of Amitābha is made by forming a lotus with the middle finger.

original: don yod grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Likewise, the gesture of Amoghasiddhi is made by bending the index finger.

original: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya las byung ba yin no //
analyzed: mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgya bzhi po 'di dag ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi phyag rgya las byung ba yin no //
translated: These four gestures of Akṣobhya and so forth arise from the gesture of Vairocana.

original: de nas badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags la bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas badzra dzny'a na zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ljags la bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should imagine vajra jñāna on the tongues of all tathāgatas.

original: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should bind the karma-mudra of all tathāgatas.

original: de la 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de la 'di ni rdo rje khu tshur las byung ba ste /
translated: Here it arises from the vajra fist.

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo ni //
translated: The left vajra index finger

original: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya //
translated: is extended in the right hand.

original: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
analyzed: byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya che //
translated: This is the great mudra of supreme enlightenment.

original: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
analyzed: sangs rgyas byang chub sbyin byed pa'o //
translated: The Buddha is the bestower of enlightenment.

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: This is Vairocana's.

original: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du snying gar bzhag la /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis chos gos kyi mtha' ma 'dzin pa'i tshul du snying gar bzhag la /
translated: Placing the left fist at the heart in the manner of holding the end of the Dharma robe,

original: g-yas pa'i so mor brkyang bas sa la reg pa'i tshul du bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i so mor brkyang bas sa la reg pa'i tshul du bya ba ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
translated: and with the right hand extended in the manner of touching the earth, this is Akshobhya's.

original: 'di nyid lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid lag pa g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
translated: This very [mudra] with the right hand in the manner of giving refuge is Ratnasambhava's.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo brkyang la lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du pang bar bzhag pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mchog ces bya ste /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyi lag pa gnyis kyi sor mo brkyang la lhung bzed 'dzin pa'i tshul du pang bar bzhag pa 'di ni ting nge 'dzin mchog ces bya ste /
translated: The two vajra fists with the fingers extended and placed on the lap in the manner of holding a begging bowl is called the supreme samadhi.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
translated: This is Amitabha's.

original: mi bskyod @73b pa'i phyag rgya las lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du byas nas bzhag pa ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
analyzed: mi bskyod @73b pa'i phyag rgya las lag pa g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa'i tshul du byas nas bzhag pa ni don yod grub pa'i'o //
translated: From the Akshobhya mudra, placing the right hand in the manner of giving refuge is Amoghasiddhi's.

original: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams la /
analyzed: de nas rang gi snying gar rdo rje bsams la /
translated: Then, visualizing a vajra at one's heart,

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind the great seal of all the tathāgatas.

original: ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
analyzed: ji skad du bshad pa'i byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ni rnam par snang mdzad kyi'o //
translated: The seal of supreme enlightenment as explained is that of Vairocana.

original: ting 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: ting 'dzin mchog gi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Having formed the seal of supreme meditative concentration,

original: lag pa g-yas pa sa la reg pa ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
analyzed: lag pa g-yas pa sa la reg pa ni mi bskyod pa'i'o //
translated: one touches the earth with the right hand: this is that of Akṣobhya.

original: de las phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
analyzed: de las phyag g-yas pa mchog sbyin pa ni rin chen 'byung ldan gyi'o //
translated: From that, the right hand in the boon-granting gesture is that of Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: ting nge 'dzin mchog ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin mchog ni 'od dpag tu med pa'i'o //
translated: Supreme meditative concentration is that of Amitābha.

original: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya las phyag g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya las phyag g-yas pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i tshul du bya ba ni don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya chen po ste /
translated: From the Akṣobhya seal, the right hand in the gesture of granting fearlessness is the great seal of Amoghasiddhi.

original: 'di dag ni phyag mtshan dang bcas pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di dag ni phyag mtshan dang bcas pa yin no //
translated: These are the seals together with the hand implements.

original: de nas khams gsum rnam bar rgyal pa'i phyag rgya dang / h'um bzhis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas khams gsum rnam bar rgyal pa'i phyag rgya dang / h'um bzhis snying ga dang / dpral ba dang / lkog ma dang / spyi bor bdag nyid byin gyis brlab par bya'o //
translated: Then, with the seal of the conqueror of the three realms, and with the four hūṃs, one should consecrate oneself at the heart, forehead, throat, and head.

original: de nas snying gar rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas dpral bar rdo rje rin chen mas /
analyzed: de nas snying gar rdo rje sems ma'i phyag rgyas dpral bar rdo rje rin chen mas /
translated: Then, at the heart, with the seal of Vajrasattva, at the forehead, with the seal of Vajraratna,

original: lkog mar rdo rje chos mas /
analyzed: lkog mar rdo rje chos mas /
translated: at the throat, with the seal of Vajradharma,

original: spyi bor rdo rje las mas byin gyis brlabs la /🔽aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
analyzed: spyi bor rdo rje las mas byin gyis brlabs la / aom badzra satva sa ma ya ma nu p'a la ya /
translated: and at the head, with the seal of Vajrakarma, one should consecrate oneself.🔽Oṃ, vajrasattva, be in me.

original: badzra satva tve no pa /🔽tishtha dri dho me bha ba /🔽su to shyo me bha ba /
analyzed: badzra satva tve no pa / tishtha dri dho me bha ba / su to shyo me bha ba /
translated: Vajrasattva, be in me.🔽Be firm.🔽Be well pleased.

original: aa nu rakto me bha ba ;
analyzed: aa nu rakto me bha ba ;
translated: Be compassionate.

original: su po shyo me bha ba /
analyzed: su po shyo me bha ba /
translated: Be well disposed.🔽I pray for the accomplishment of all.

original: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha: sarba karma su tsa me /
analyzed: sarba siddhi mme pra ya tstsha: sarba karma su tsa me /
translated: All actions are well done.

original: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
analyzed: tsittam shre ya: ku ru h'um /
translated: Make my mind joyful, hūṃ.

original: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzri bha ba mah'a sa ma ya satva a'a: zhes bya ba yi ge brgya ba lan gsum bzlas pas brtan par byas nas srung ba chen po bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: ha ha ha ha ho: bha ga b'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra m'a me munytsa badzri bha ba mah'a sa ma ya satva a'a: zhes bya ba yi ge brgya ba lan gsum bzlas pas brtan par byas nas srung ba chen po bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Having stabilized it with the recitation three times of the hundred-syllable mantra, Om vajra heruka, all tathāgatas, do not abandon me, vajra being, great pledge, truth, one should place the crest-jewel on the head with the mantra and gesture for the sake of the great protection.

original: aom badzra aushni sha h'um phat ;
analyzed: aom badzra aushni sha h'um phat ;
translated: Om vajra uṣṇīṣa hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pa gtsug tor du dgod par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i rig pa 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pa gtsug tor du dgod par bya'o //
translated: With this knowledge and the gesture, one should place the crest-jewel on the head.

original: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcings te //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba dam bcings te //
translated: Having firmly bound the vajra bond,

original: mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni //
analyzed: mthe bong nang du sbyar nas ni //
translated: with the thumbs joined inside,

original: mdzub mo bkug ste gnyis gas dgab //
analyzed: mdzub mo bkug ste gnyis gas dgab //
translated: the index fingers bent and covering the two,

original: sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o //
analyzed: sems dpa'i gtsug tor zhes bya'o //
translated: this is called the crest-jewel of the bodhisattvas.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'di'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: This is its gesture.

original: yid gtsug tor gyi steng du sngags 'di'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas gzi brjid phung po 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o //
analyzed: yid gtsug tor gyi steng du sngags 'di'i phyag rgya dang ldan pas gzi brjid phung po 'bar ba'i 'khor lo'i phyag rgya gzhag par bya'o //
translated: With the crest-jewel on the head, endowed with the gesture of this mantra, one should place the blazing wheel of the heap of splendor.

original: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aushn'i sha te dzo ra shi aa na pa li ki n'a murdha h'um /
analyzed: aom na ma: sarba ta th'a ga ta aushn'i sha te dzo ra shi aa na pa li ki n'a murdha h'um /
translated: Oṃ namo! To all tathāgatas, Uṣṇīṣa-tejas, Ānapali, kīna mudra hūṃ.

original: dza la ta ka bi dha ka dha ra bi dha ra tsindha bindha hum phat /
analyzed: dza la ta ka bi dha ka dha ra bi dha ra tsindha bindha hum phat /
translated: Jala taka vidhaka dhāra vidhara cchinda bin dha hūṃ phaṭ.

original: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni //🔽mthe bong @74a * //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni // mthe bong @74a * //
translated: Having made the vajra bond,🔽the thumbs

original: gung mo mthe'u bsgreng //
analyzed: gung mo mthe'u bsgreng //
translated: and middle fingers are extended.

original: gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste //
analyzed: gzi brjid phung po zhes bya ste //
translated: This is called the mass of splendor,

original: dngos grub myur du sbyin byed pa'o //
analyzed: dngos grub myur du sbyin byed pa'o //
translated: which quickly bestows spiritual powers.

original: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma bcings la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma bcings la /
translated: Then, having bound the Vajradhātvīśvarī,

original: spyi gtsug tu aa las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: spyi gtsug tu aa las rnam par snang mdzad bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o //
translated: one should generate Vairocana from the letter a at the crown and say this:

original: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri ni aabhishi nytsa m'am ;
analyzed: aom badzra dh'a tv'i shva ri h'um badzri ni aabhishi nytsa m'am ;
translated: Oṃ vajra-dhātu-śrī hūṃ vajrī abhiṣiñcāmi māṃ.

original: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: mi bskyod pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Having bound the Akṣobhya mudrā,

original: yi ge h'um las dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa ste /
analyzed: yi ge h'um las dpral ba'i steng du mi bskyod pa ste /
translated: one should generate Akṣobhya from the letter hūṃ above the forehead.

original: aom badzra badzri ni h'um aa bhishinytsa m'am /
analyzed: aom badzra badzri ni h'um aa bhishinytsa m'am /
translated: Oṃ vajra vajrī hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmi māṃ.

original: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Having bound the Ratnasaṃbhava mudrā,

original: yi ge tr'am las rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan no //
analyzed: yi ge tr'am las rna ba g-yas pa'i steng du rin chen 'byung ldan no //
translated: On the right ear, from the syllable taṃ, is Ratnasaṃbhava.

original: aom ratna badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
analyzed: aom ratna badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
translated: Om ratna vajrīṇi hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmi.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Form the mudrā of Amitābha.

original: yi ge hr'i: las rgyab tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
analyzed: yi ge hr'i: las rgyab tu ni 'od dpag tu med pa'o //
translated: On the back, from the syllable hrīḥ, is Amitābha.

original: aom dharma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
analyzed: aom dharma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
translated: Om dharma vajrīṇi hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmi.

original: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Form the mudrā of Amoghasiddhi.

original: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du yi ge aa las don yod grub pa bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: rna ba g-yon pa'i steng du yi ge aa las don yod grub pa bskyed la 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: On the left ear, from the syllable aṃ, is Amoghasiddhi.

original: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
analyzed: aom karma badzri ni h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /
translated: Om karma vajrīṇi hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmi.

original: rdo rje thal mo bcings la ;🔽mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo bcings la ; mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la //
translated: Form the vajra-folded-hands.🔽The two thumbs are crossed.

original: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas ni //
analyzed: mdzub mo rtse mo bkug pas ni //
translated: The tips of the two index fingers are bent.

original: gung mo snyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar //🔽rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
analyzed: gung mo snyam pa'i tshigs su sbyar // rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad //
translated: The two middle fingers are joined at the third joint.🔽This is explained as the queen of the vajra realm.

original: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
analyzed: de nyid gung mo rdo rjer bya //
translated: The same, with the two middle fingers vajra-joined,

original: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ni nor bur bya //
translated: and the two middle fingers made into a jewel,🔽is the king of the vajra realm.

original: padmor srin lag mthe'u chung gung /
analyzed: padmor srin lag mthe'u chung gung /
translated: The ring finger, little finger, and middle finger

original: lag pa sor mo rab tu brkyang //
analyzed: lag pa sor mo rab tu brkyang //
translated: are extended in the lotus.

original: zhes bya'o ; / aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am /🔽zhes brjod la /🔽rdo rje r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya'o ; / aom badzra dzva la aa na l'arka h'um aa bhi shinytsa m'am / zhes brjod la / rdo rje r'inti ri'i phyag rgyas rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba'i dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: Oṃ vajra jvalānāla hūṃ abhiṣiñcāmi māṃ.🔽Saying this, one should take the empowerment of Vajra-jvalānāla with the mudra of Vajra-ratnā.

original: rdo rje bsdams ba nang bcings nas //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams ba nang bcings nas //
translated: Having bound the vajra-bond

original: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba //
analyzed: yid kyis khros nas dgab bya ba //
translated: with the mind, one should cover with wrath.

original: rdo rje mthe bo dam po ste //
analyzed: rdo rje mthe bo dam po ste //
translated: The vajra is the firm thumb,

original: khro bo ti r'anti rir bshad //
analyzed: khro bo ti r'anti rir bshad //
translated: explained as the wrathful Tīrntri.

original: 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams te phyogs bzhi rdo rje phreng ba bcing pa'i tshul du byas la /
analyzed: 'dis spyi bo nas brtsams te phyogs bzhi rdo rje phreng ba bcing pa'i tshul du byas la /
translated: With this, beginning from the crown, one should make the four directions in the manner of binding the vajra garland,

original: dpral bar gzhag go //
analyzed: dpral bar gzhag go //
translated: and place it on the forehead.

original: aom tum zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang ldan pas go cha bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom tum zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang ldan pas go cha bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Oṃ tuṃ. This is the armor binding with the mudra.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar 'dud pa'i tshul du bya ba dang / de bzhin du mgrin pa dang / ltag pa dang yang snying ga dang / nu ma'i bar dang slar yang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / rtag pa dang dpral ba'i steng du mdud pa'i tshul du byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis snying gar 'dud pa'i tshul du bya ba dang / de bzhin du mgrin pa dang / ltag pa dang yang snying ga dang / nu ma'i bar dang slar yang snying ga dang / mgrin pa dang / rtag pa dang dpral ba'i steng du mdud pa'i tshul du byas la /
translated: at the throat, at the back of the neck, and above the forehead, make a knot.

original: mgo bor phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du byas la /
analyzed: mgo bor phreng ba bcing ba'i tshul du byas la /
translated: At the head, make a garland.

original: mtha' ma la sogs pa nas dgrol ba'i tshul gyis dar dpyangs bya ba'i thabs su byas la /
analyzed: mtha' ma la sogs pa nas dgrol ba'i tshul gyis dar dpyangs bya ba'i thabs su byas la /
translated: At the end, and so on, make a hanging silk streamer.

original: de mnyam pa'i thal @74b mo badzra tu shtya ho: zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o //
analyzed: de mnyam pa'i thal @74b mo badzra tu shtya ho: zhes bya bas mnyes par bya'o //
translated: With the palms joined, say vajra-tuṣya-hoḥ, and please them.

original: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la phyag byas nas /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje thal mo bskor la bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la phyag byas nas /
translated: Then, turning the vajra palms, pay homage to Bhagavān Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge h'um las bskyed pa'i rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Take up the vajra produced from the syllable hūṃ.

original: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang //
translated: The vajra empowerment of all buddhas

original: deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya //
analyzed: deng 'dir khyod la bskur bar bya //
translated: is conferred upon you today.

original: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun du rab bsgrub phyir /
translated: In order to fully accomplish all buddhas,

original: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
analyzed: rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long //
translated: you should take up this vajra.

original: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi shshtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
analyzed: aom badzra aa dhi pa ti tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi shshtha badzra sa ma ya stvam /
translated: Oṃ vajra adhipatistvaṃ abhiṣiñcāmi śāṭṭa vajra samaya stvaṃ

original: aom badzra p'a ni badzra karma ka rodbha zhes bya ba 'dis /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni badzra karma ka rodbha zhes bya ba 'dis /
translated: Oṃ vajra pāṇi vajra karma karo bhava

original: rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje spyi bor bzhag la ming gi dbang bskur ba blang bar bya'o //
translated: With this, place the vajra on the crown and take up the empowerment of the name.

original: aom badzra kro dha tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
analyzed: aom badzra kro dha tvam aa bhi shinyts'a mi badzra n'a ma aa bhi she ka ta /
translated: Oṃ vajra krodha tvaṃ abhiṣiñcāmi vajra nāma abhiṣekata

original: kye h'um mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
analyzed: kye h'um mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba la sogs pas so //
translated: Oṃ hūṃkāra vajra and so forth.

original: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par mchod la yang bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag rgya chen po bcings la de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should offer oneself with the four secret offerings of the goddess of charm and so forth, and also form the great mudra of the Bhagavān and hold the vajra of suchness.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' btul bas na //
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' btul bas na //
translated: Since Vajrasattva is subdued,

original: khro bo rtag tu chags las byung //
analyzed: khro bo rtag tu chags las byung //
translated: he is always born from passion.

original: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ni //
analyzed: rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba ni //
translated: The vajra is blazing like fire,

original: bdag ni rab tu 'jigs byed pa'o //
analyzed: bdag ni rab tu 'jigs byed pa'o //
translated: and I am the one who terrifies.

original: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid do //
translated: This is reality.

original: aa las byung ba'i chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
analyzed: aa las byung ba'i chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya'o //
translated: One should ring the Dharma bell arisen from A.

original: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: Everything has the characteristic of space,

original: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
analyzed: nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med //
translated: and space has no characteristic.

original: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam rnal 'byor pas //
translated: The yogin who is equal to space

original: thams cad myur ba nyid du 'grub //
analyzed: thams cad myur ba nyid du 'grub //
translated: quickly accomplishes everything.

original: ces bya ba ni chos so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni chos so //
translated: This is the Dharma.

original: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
analyzed: dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen por byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
translated: One should consecrate the great pledge seal:

original: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba yis //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkhar sbyor ba yis //
translated: By uniting everything in space,

original: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
analyzed: thams cad nam mkha' zhes smra zhing //
translated: one should say, “Everything is space.”

original: rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
analyzed: rdo rje phyag rgyas rgyas btab la //
translated: Having sealed it with the vajra seal,

original: khams gsum pa ni bza' bar bya ;
analyzed: khams gsum pa ni bza' bar bya ;
translated: one should consume the three realms.

original: / zhes pa ni dam tshig go //
analyzed: / zhes pa ni dam tshig go //
translated: This is the pledge.

original: de nas 'dis rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas 'dis rdo rje brtul zhugs blang bar bya ste /
translated: Then one should take up the vajra conduct with this:

original: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
analyzed: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de //
translated: This is that of all buddhas,

original: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i lag na 'dug / khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang //
translated: and you must always hold it.

original: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan //
translated: Be firm in the observances of Vajrapāṇi.

original: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra ya mi badzra satva hi hi hi hi h'um /
analyzed: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta siddhi badzra sa ma ya tishtha ae sha tvam dha ra ya mi badzra satva hi hi hi hi h'um /
translated: Oṃ, all tathāgatas’ accomplishment, be firm in the vajra vow, I order you! Be firm, be firm, be firm! Hūṃ!

original: gal te rnal 'byor chen po byed 'dod na //
analyzed: gal te rnal 'byor chen po byed 'dod na //
translated: If you wish to perform the great yoga,

original: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig sems dpar gyin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i bar gyi cho ga'i rjes su spyad la /
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du dam tshig sems dpar gyin gyis brlabs pa dang / phyag rgya chen po bcings pa'i bar gyi cho ga'i rjes su spyad la /
translated: consecrate yourself as the pledge being as before, up to the ritual action of binding the great seal.

original: rang gi lus la yid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas snying gar stong gsum pa'i cha @75a * //
analyzed: rang gi lus la yid kyis nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas snying gar stong gsum pa'i cha @75a * //
translated: In your body, with the yoga equal to space, in your heart, in the center of a moon mandala, visualize the essence mantra.

original: dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po lngas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du
analyzed: dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshad tsam gyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i snying po lngas khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ji lta ba bzhin du
translated: On top of that moon mandala, the size of a buddha realm equal to the trichiliocosm, emanate the great maṇḍala of Trilokavijaya, just as it is, with the five essences of the four-seal maṇḍala of Trilokavijaya.

original: sprul la / bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsams te /
analyzed: sprul la / bdag nyid rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsams te /
translated: Imagine oneself as Vajra Hūṃkara.

original: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings nas /
analyzed: khro bo ti r'inti ri'i phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings nas /
translated: Form the mudra of Krodhavajra Tīrntri,

original: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
analyzed: de nyid kyis me tog gi phreng ba bzung la /
translated: and hold the flower garland with that.

original: 'jug pa'i sngags zlos shing rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor der 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i sngags zlos shing rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor der 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Recite the entry mantra and enter that maṇḍala located at one’s heart.

original: de nas me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis rang gi spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
analyzed: de nas me tog dor ba'i sngags kyis rang gi spyi bor me tog gi phreng ba dor la /
translated: Then, with the mantra for tossing the flower, toss the flower garland over one’s head.

original: phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rang gi mgo la bcings nas gdong g-yogs dgrol ba'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs bkrol la /
analyzed: phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i sngags kyis rang gi mgo la bcings nas gdong g-yogs dgrol ba'i sngags kyis gdong g-yogs bkrol la /
translated: Having bound the rosary empowerment mantra on one’s head, one should remove the blindfold with the mantra for removing the blindfold.

original: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor bltas la /
analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu nas brtsams te rang gi snying ga'i dkyil 'khor bltas la /
translated: Beginning with the vajra hook, one should look at the maṇḍala in one’s heart.

original: tishthas badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bkrol la chu'i dbang bskur ba de'i snying po yid kyis blangs nas /
analyzed: tishthas badzra zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i 'jug pa'i phyag rgya snying gar bkrol la chu'i dbang bskur ba de'i snying po yid kyis blangs nas /
translated: Having released the entrance seal at the heart with “Oṃ vajra hetu maṃ,” and so on, having mentally taken the essence of the empowerment conferral with water,

original: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas lnga'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang bskur la /
translated: one should confer empowerment on oneself with the seal of conferring empowerment with the diadem of the five buddhas.

original: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje phreng ba'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyas dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: One should confer empowerment with the seal of conferring empowerment with the vajra rosary.

original: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje dang bdag po dang ming gi dbang bskur ba blangs te /
translated: Then, having taken the empowerment of the vajra, the master, and the name,

original: rdo rje brtul zhugs bzung nas dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga'i zla bar thim par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje brtul zhugs bzung nas dkyil 'khor de rang gi snying ga'i zla bar thim par bsam par bya'o //
translated: one should hold the vajra discipline and imagine that the maṇḍala dissolves into the moon in one’s heart.

original: de nas sa ma ya aa zhes zlos shing rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
analyzed: de nas sa ma ya aa zhes zlos shing rang gi lus la lha thams cad kyi gnas su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed la phyag rgya chen po bcings te /
translated: Then, reciting “samaya-aḥ,” one should generate the moon maṇḍala in the location of all the deities in one’s body and bind the great seal.

original: mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su yang de bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
analyzed: mdun gyi nam mkha'i phyogs su yang de bzhin du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de'i steng du /
translated: In the same way, in the space in front, on a moon maṇḍala,

original: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um /🔽grihna grihna h'um /
analyzed: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um / grihna grihna h'um /
translated: one should recite “oṃ sumbha niḥ sumbha hūṃ /🔽gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hūṃ /

original: grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
analyzed: grihna pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um /
translated: gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hūṃ /

original: a'a na ya ho /
analyzed: a'a na ya ho /
translated: ānayaho /

original: bha ga b'a na badzra h'um phat a'a: zhes bya bas de bzhin du 'bar ba'i rdo rje bdag nyid dbab par byas te /
analyzed: bha ga b'a na badzra h'um phat a'a: zhes bya bas de bzhin du 'bar ba'i rdo rje bdag nyid dbab par byas te /
translated: bhagavān vajra hūṃ phaṭ āḥ,” and one should cause the blazing vajra to descend.

original: rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: rdo rje'i nga rgyal rnam par bsgoms nas /
translated: Having meditated on the vajra pride,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgom pa yang byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad du bsgom pa yang byas nas /
translated: one should also meditate on Vajrahūṃkāra.

original: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / blta ba byas nas rang gi lus la bcug la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
analyzed: dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / blta ba byas nas rang gi lus la bcug la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed de /
translated: Having performed the summoning, inducting, binding, controlling, and gazing, one should enter one’s body and generate the maṇḍala of light.

original: sa ma ya stvam hr'i: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya ba dang / h'um bzhi yang brjod la /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam hr'i: sa ma ya stvam aa ham zhes bya ba dang / h'um bzhi yang brjod la /
translated: And also say the four hūṃs.

original: rdo rje @75b h'um mdzad bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje @75b h'um mdzad bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: One should accomplish the vajra hūṃ-kāra.

original: de bzhin du khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
analyzed: de bzhin du khro bo rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: Likewise, having bound the great mudra of the wrathful vajra summoning,

original: aom badzra a'a be sha ma h'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma yam h'um aa: zhes bya ba 'dis mdun du rdo rje dril bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid dbab par byas nas /
analyzed: aom badzra a'a be sha ma h'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma yam h'um aa: zhes bya ba 'dis mdun du rdo rje dril bu'i gzugs su bdag nyid dbab par byas nas /
translated: with oṃ vajra āveśaya mahā-krodhāveśaya sarva-samayaṃ hūṃ aḥ, one should cause oneself to descend in the form of a vajra bell in front.

original: badzra ghando ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: badzra ghando ham zhes bya bas dril bu'i nga rgyal bsgom par bya'o //
translated: With vajra-ghaṇṭa-haṃ, one should meditate on the pride of the bell.

original: de nas yang badzra a'a be sha mh'a kro dho ham /
analyzed: de nas yang badzra a'a be sha mh'a kro dho ham /
translated: Then, with vajra āveśaya mahā-krodha-haṃ,

original: zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje'i 'bebs pa'i nga rgyal byas la /
analyzed: zhes bya bas khro bo rdo rje'i 'bebs pa'i nga rgyal byas la /
translated: one should generate the pride of the wrathful vajra summoning.

original: de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas khro bo chen po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas nas khro bo chen po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled with just that vajra hook and so forth, one should bind the mudra of the great wrathful vajra summoning.

original: 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: He should say this:🔽vajra āveśa🔽mahākrodhāveśaya

original: badzra a'a be sha mah'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarba ma yam h'um aa dri shya /
analyzed: badzra a'a be sha mah'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarba ma yam h'um aa dri shya /
translated: sarva māyaṃ hūṃ āḥ

original: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
analyzed: yang dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / dza: h'um bam ho: zhes brjod do //
translated: Then, with that very samaya mudra, he should say jaḥ hūṃ vaṃ hoḥ.

original: rdo rje 'bebs pa rang gi gnas su dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
analyzed: rdo rje 'bebs pa rang gi gnas su dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du byas la /
translated: Having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and controlled Vajrāveśa in his own place,

original: sa ma ya stvam hri zhes zlos shing rgyab tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam hri zhes zlos shing rgyab tu 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed la /
translated: he should recite “samaya stvaṃ hrīḥ” and generate a blazing garland of light in the maṇḍala behind him.

original: sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba dang / de'i sngags kyang zlos shing der bdag nyid khro bo rdo rje 'bebs par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: sa ma ya stvam zhes bya ba dang / de'i sngags kyang zlos shing der bdag nyid khro bo rdo rje 'bebs par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Reciting “samaya stvaṃ” and his mantra, he should meditate on himself as Vajrāveśa there.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo //
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje sems dpa' dang chos dang las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgyas gdab bo //
translated: In the same way, he should seal with Vajrasattva, Dharma, Karma, and Mahāmudrā.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du lha rnams kyi sku dang / rang gi lus la yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la /
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du lha rnams kyi sku dang / rang gi lus la yid kyis legs pa'i sbyor ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcug la /
translated: Then, as before, one should mentally join the bodies of the deities and one's own body, and in the same way, one should cause all the Tathagatas to enter.

original: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par bya'o //
translated: One should seal them with the four seals.

original: de'i rjes la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas snga ma bzhin du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs la yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should consecrate oneself with the Vairocana mudra of the three worlds, as before, and stabilize it with the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor dang gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor yang bkod la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i gtsug tor dang gzi brjid phung po'i gtsug tor yang bkod la /
translated: Then, one should also arrange the uṣṇīṣa of Vajrasattva and the uṣṇīṣa of Tejorāśi.

original: yi ge brgya pa yang bzlas nas rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi cho ga rjes su spyad par bya'o //
analyzed: yi ge brgya pa yang bzlas nas rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi cho ga rjes su spyad par bya'o //
translated: Having also recited the hundred-syllable mantra, one should perform the ritual up to the vajra conduct.

original: de nas gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gnas kyi nges pa bshad par bya ste /
translated: Then, the explanation of the definite places:

original: sgrub pa po'i mdun gyi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'/
analyzed: sgrub pa po'i mdun gyi snying ga'i zla bar rdo rje h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'/
translated: In front of the practitioner, on the moon at the heart, is Vajra Hūṃkāra and the wrathful Vajrasattva.

original: g-yas logs su khro bo'i rgyal po /
analyzed: g-yas logs su khro bo'i rgyal po /
translated: To the right is the king of wrathful ones.

original: g-yon logs su chags pa /
analyzed: g-yon logs su chags pa /
translated: To the left is the passionate one.

original: rgyab du legs pa /
analyzed: rgyab du legs pa /
translated: Excellent is in the back.

original: dpral bar rin chen h'um mdzad dang / khro bo khro gnyer can /
analyzed: dpral bar rin chen h'um mdzad dang / khro bo khro gnyer can /
translated: Ratna-hūṃkāra and the wrathful Sumbha are in the forehead.

original: rgyab tu nyi ma /
analyzed: rgyab tu nyi ma /
translated: Sun is in the back.

original: phrag pa dag tu rgyal mtshan /🔽so'i @76a * //
analyzed: phrag pa dag tu rgyal mtshan / so'i @76a * //
translated: Victory banner is in the shoulders.

original: phreng ba gnyis la bzhad pa /
analyzed: phreng ba gnyis la bzhad pa /
translated: The two rows of teeth are for the laughing.

original: lkog mar chos kyi h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje chos /
analyzed: lkog mar chos kyi h'um mdzad dang khro bo rdo rje chos /
translated: Dharma-hūṃkāra and the wrathful Vajradharma are in the throat.

original: nu ma gnyis kyi bar du rnon po /
analyzed: nu ma gnyis kyi bar du rnon po /
translated: Sharp is between the two breasts.

original: lte bar rgyu /
analyzed: lte bar rgyu /
translated: Flow is in the navel.

original: lce la smra ba /🔽spyi bor las kyi h'um mdzad dang / khro bo rdo rje las /
analyzed: lce la smra ba / spyi bor las kyi h'um mdzad dang / khro bo rdo rje las /
translated: Speech is on the tongue.🔽Karma-hūṃkāra and the wrathful Vajrakarma are in the crown.

original: nam tshong du rdo rje srung ba /🔽khar rdo rje gnod sbyin /
analyzed: nam tshong du rdo rje srung ba / khar rdo rje gnod sbyin /
translated: Vajra-raksha is in the anus.🔽Vajrayaksha is in the mouth.

original: dkur khro bo rdo rje khu tshur /
analyzed: dkur khro bo rdo rje khu tshur /
translated: The wrathful Vajramudgara is in the armpit.

original: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi g-yon logs su sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / glu ma dang / gar ma bzhugs so //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi g-yon logs su sgeg mo dang / phreng ba ma dang / glu ma dang / gar ma bzhugs so //
translated: The wrathful Vajrasattva, Ratna, Dharma, and Karma are on the left sides of the goddesses Lāsya, Mālā, Gītā, and Nrtya, respectively.

original: yang sngags pa'i gsang ba'i gnas kyi phyogs su bdug spos ma /
analyzed: yang sngags pa'i gsang ba'i gnas kyi phyogs su bdug spos ma /
translated: Incense is in the secret place of the man.

original: mgo bor me tog ma /
analyzed: mgo bor me tog ma /
translated: Flower is in the head.

original: mig gnyis su mar me ma /
analyzed: mig gnyis su mar me ma /
translated: Lamp is in the two eyes.

original: nu ma dang brang dang / snying gar byug pa ma /
analyzed: nu ma dang brang dang / snying gar byug pa ma /
translated: The consort is smeared on the breasts, chest, and heart.

original: lag pa g-yas su rdo rje lcags kyu /
analyzed: lag pa g-yas su rdo rje lcags kyu /
translated: The vajra hook is on the right hand.

original: g-yon du zhags pa /
analyzed: g-yon du zhags pa /
translated: The noose is on the left.

original: byin pa g-yas su lcags sgrog / byin pa g-yon du 'bebs pa'o //
analyzed: byin pa g-yas su lcags sgrog / byin pa g-yon du 'bebs pa'o //
translated: The iron chain is on the right thigh, and the bell is on the left.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yan lag gi cha thams cad du bzhugs so //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni yan lag gi cha thams cad du bzhugs so //
translated: The tathāgatas reside in all the parts of the body.

original: de nas phyag bzhi byas la /🔽aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
analyzed: de nas phyag bzhi byas la / aom badzra a'atma ko& ham /
translated: Then, having made four prostrations,

original: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
analyzed: aom sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham /
translated: one should recite the three essence mantras, “Oṃ vajra ātmāko ’haṃ,”🔽“Oṃ svabhāva śuddho ’haṃ,”

original: aom sarba sa mo& ham /
analyzed: aom sarba sa mo& ham /
translated: and “Oṃ sarva samāśuddho ’haṃ,”

original: zhes bya ba'i snying po gsum zlos shing rdo rje'i bdag nyid can dang / rang bzhin can gyi dag pa dang / bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi lha thams cad dang mnyam par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i snying po gsum zlos shing rdo rje'i bdag nyid can dang / rang bzhin can gyi dag pa dang / bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi lha thams cad dang mnyam par bdag nyid bsgom par bya'o //
translated: and meditate on oneself as the same as all the deities, who are of the nature of vajra, pure by nature, and the same as the selflessness of all.

original: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul du lha chen po'i chung ma dang bcas pa bkug ste /
analyzed: yang na rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bcings la 'og nas bshad pa'i tshul du lha chen po'i chung ma dang bcas pa bkug ste /
translated: Alternatively, having formed the great mudrā of Vajrahūṃkāra just as it is, one should summon the great gods together with their wives in the manner that will be explained below.

original: rkang pa gnyis ji lta ba bzhin mnan la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su bzlas par bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bris nas /
analyzed: rkang pa gnyis ji lta ba bzhin mnan la rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i rdo rje dbus su bzlas par bya ba'i sngags yid kyis bris nas /
translated: Having pressed down the two feet just as before, one should mentally write the mantra to be recited in the center of the vajra located in one's heart.

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na gnas shing bzla sa pa'i don yid la sems bzhin du rdo rje'i tshig gam /

original: khro bo'i tshig gis zlos shing /

original: 'dod chags nyid las yang dag byung //

original: khro bo bdag ces bsgom par bya //

original: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa //
analyzed: snying po phyag rgya sngags rig pa //

original: myur du 'grub par byed pa yin //
analyzed: myur du 'grub par byed pa yin //

original: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate on this samadhi.

original: yang na rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba la sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'khor los khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
analyzed: yang na rang gi snying gar gnas pa'i zla ba la sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje 'khor los khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po sprul la /
translated: Alternatively, on the moon located in one's heart, one should emanate the great mandala of the Three Realms Victorious, as previously explained, with the vajra wheel.

original: aom badzra dzva l'a gni pra ti ba ta a'a karsha ya sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzra sa ma ye h'um dza: zhes bya ba nas aom @76b badzra a'a be sham h'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma yam h'um aa:zhes bya ba'i bar
analyzed: aom badzra dzva l'a gni pra ti ba ta a'a karsha ya sarba ta th'a ga ta ma h'a badzra sa ma ye h'um dza: zhes bya ba nas aom @76b badzra a'a be sham h'a kro dha a'a be sha ya sarba sa ma yam h'um aa:zhes bya ba'i bar
translated: With the mantra Om vajra jvalani pratibhava akarsaya sarva tathagata maha vajra samaye hum jra, up to Om vajra avaham ha krodha avahaya sarva samaya hum a

original: gyi sngags kyis dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa la bzhugs pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas de rnams dang bdag nyid lhan cig tu gyur par rnam par bsams la /
analyzed: gyi sngags kyis dpal rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa nas rdo rje 'bebs pa'i bar du seng ge'i gdan la sogs pa la bzhugs pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sbyor bas de rnams dang bdag nyid lhan cig tu gyur par rnam par bsams la /
translated: one should imagine that Sri Vairochana and so forth, up to Vajravesa, are seated on lion thrones and so forth, and that they are united with oneself through the yoga of the sky-farers.

analyzed: badzra a'atma ko la sogs pa'i snying po gsum zlos shing /
translated: Reciting the three essences beginning with vajra atmako,

original: de'i don gsum bsgoms la khams gsum rnam bar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i don gsum bsgoms la khams gsum rnam bar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ni bdag yin no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //

original: de nas de bzhin du sngags zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bzhin du sngags zlos shing bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, reciting the mantra in the same way, one should meditate.

original: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra mngon par sgrogs par mdzad par lhag par bsam par bya ste /
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang sngags kyi sgra mngon par sgrogs par mdzad par lhag par bsam par bya ste /

original: de lta bus ni bzlas pa thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni bzlas pa thams cad bzlas par 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de nas bzlas pa'i don ni aom zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad do //

original: sumbha zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //
analyzed: sumbha zhes bya ba ni bod pa'o //

original: h'um zhes pa ni des sod cig pa'o //
analyzed: h'um zhes pa ni des sod cig pa'o //

analyzed: phat ces bya ba ni ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba 'pho bar bya'o //

original: lhag ma ni go bar zad do //
analyzed: lhag ma ni go bar zad do //

original: h'um bzhi pa ni lan bzhi brjod par ston pa'i rang bzhin no //
analyzed: h'um bzhi pa ni lan bzhi brjod par ston pa'i rang bzhin no //

original: de yang aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //
analyzed: de yang aom ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o //

analyzed: sumbha ni sumbha zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pas rjes su thul cig ces gsungs pa'o //

original: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /
analyzed: 'dis ni 'di skad ston te /

original: bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'dul bar mdzad na lha la sogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos /🔽'dul ba'i sdug bsngal 'jig pa ste //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'dul bar mdzad na lha la sogs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos / 'dul ba'i sdug bsngal 'jig pa ste //

original: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gcod pa yin //
analyzed: srid pa'i sdug bsngal gcod pa yin //

analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba gsod pa'i mchog / gdug pa skrag pa gsod pa yin //

analyzed: zhes pa dang / nyon mongs gdug pa ltung byed cing //

original: zhi bas 'gugs pa yin par bshad //
analyzed: zhi bas 'gugs pa yin par bshad //

original: phat ces bya ba ltung ba'i sgra //
analyzed: phat ces bya ba ltung ba'i sgra //

original: ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba ltung ba'o //
analyzed: ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba ltung ba'o //

original: yang na ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste /
analyzed: yang na ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya ste /
translated: Or else, one should cultivate the three meditative concentrations.

analyzed: rnal 'byor gcig dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcings la /
translated: or bound in the great seal endowed with the single yoga,

original: blos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /
analyzed: blos nam mkha'i phyogs su gnas te /

original: stong gsum pa'i @77a * //
analyzed: stong gsum pa'i @77a * //

analyzed: nam mkha' dang mnyam par bsams la /

analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge bam las chu'i dkyil 'khor /

analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge lam las gser gyi dkyil 'khor ;

analyzed: de'i steng du yi ge bam las rgya mtsho chen po //

analyzed: chu dang gser gyi dkyil 'khor der //

analyzed: rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan par bsams la /

original: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba /
analyzed: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba /

original: raksha sarbam sv'a h'a ;
analyzed: raksha sarbam sv'a h'a ;
translated: Raksha Sarvaṁ Svaha,

analyzed: zhes zlos shing rdo rje bsdams pas gzhi la reg pas rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par bya'o //

original: rnam par snang mdzad kyi gnas su aa sim zhes bya ba las seng ge'i gdan mi bskyod pa'i gnas su h'um gam h'um zhes bya ba las glang po che'i gdan /

analyzed: rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gnas su tr'a bam tr'a zhes bya ba las rta'i gdan /
translated: From the horse throne in the place of Ratnasaṃbhava, say traṃ vaṃ traṃ.🔽From the peacock throne in the place of Amitābha, say hriḥ maṃ hriḥ.

original: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su hr'i: mam hr'i: zhes bya ba rma bya'i gdan /
analyzed: 'od dpag tu med pa'i gnas su hr'i: mam hr'i: zhes bya ba rma bya'i gdan /

original: don yod grub pa'i gnas su aa:mam a'a:zhes bya ba las nam mkha' lding gi gdan la aa las byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis mnan pa rnam par bsams nas sems dpa'i skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug la /

translated: Then, after imagining that they are pressed down by moon maṇḍalas arisen from aḥ, one should sit in the bodhisattva posture.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang / chos nyid dang / theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba'i chos dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku nyid dang / chos nyid dang / theg pa chen pos nges par 'byung ba'i chos dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsdus pa'i dge 'dun rjes su dran par bya'o //
translated: One should recollect the body of the Tathāgatas, the Dharma, the community that is gathered by the irreversible bodhisattvas, and the Dharma that is the deliverance by means of the Great Vehicle.

original: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsdus pa thams cad la snying rje ba dang / 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang /
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad 'gro ba thams cad kyis bsdus pa'i sems can thams cad la lhag par byams pa bskyed par bya ba dang / ngan 'gro la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bsdus pa thams cad la snying rje ba dang / 'phags pa thams cad la dga' ba dang /
translated: Then, one should generate loving kindness toward all sentient beings included in all migrating beings in all world-realms, compassion toward all those included in the suffering of the miserable destinies and so forth, and joy toward all the āryas.

original: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yang btang snyoms su bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / @77b mi g-yor du mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par bya ba dang /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad yang btang snyoms su bya ba dang / chos thams cad kyang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sgyu ma dang mtshungs pa nyid dang / @77b mi g-yor du mtshungs pa nyid du lhag par mos par bya ba dang /
translated: It is to be indifferent to all worldly phenomena, and to have superior conviction in all phenomena being the nature of non-entity, being like an illusion, and being like a mirage.

original: byang chub kyi sems dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / rigs lnga dang / rdo rje dang / dril bu dang phyag rgya dang / slob dpon nyid dang / byams pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang ;
analyzed: byang chub kyi sems dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod pa dang / rigs lnga dang / rdo rje dang / dril bu dang phyag rgya dang / slob dpon nyid dang / byams pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang ;
translated: It is to have the mind of awakening, the perfection of wisdom, the conduct of skillful means, the five families, the vajra, the bell, the mudrā, the master, love, fearlessness,

original: zang zing dang chos kyi sbyin pa mngon du bya ba dang / gsang sngags kyi sgo'i spyod pa rnams dang bcas pa'i chos thams cad kyi tshul thams cad ston pa dang / bslab pa dang / sdom pa thams cad nan tan du byas shing cho gas yongs su rdzogs pa dang /

translated: and to manifest the generosity of material things and the Dharma. It is to teach all the ways of all the Dharmas, including the conduct of the gateway of secret mantra, and to earnestly practice and ritually perfect all the trainings and vows.

original: sems can rnams bskyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba yang mngon du byas nas bdag nyid cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub par lhag par mos pas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa mngon du
analyzed: sems can rnams bskyab pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya ba yang mngon du byas nas bdag nyid cod pan gyi dbang bskur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub par lhag par mos pas 'og min du mngon par byang chub pa mngon du
translated: Having manifested the protection of sentient beings and the worship and service of the tathagatas, one should imagine oneself as the bodhisattva mahasattva Sarvarthasiddha, who has received the empowerment of the diadem, and manifest the enlightenment of Akanishtha.

original: byas nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas yongs su bskor te /
analyzed: byas nas mi bskyod pa la sogs pas yongs su bskor te /
translated: Having manifested that, one should imagine oneself surrounded by Akshobhya and the others,

original: ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi rtse mo na gnas pa'i rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang pa ba rtsegs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams las nges par 'byung ba'i seng ge'i gdan la zhal thams cad pas bzhugs par bsams la /

translated: residing on the peak of Mount Meru, the king of mountains, in a palace made of vajra, jewels, and precious substances, on a lion throne that arises from the merit of all tathagatas, seated in the samadhi of all faces.

original: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya bcings te /

original: badzra sa tva zhes zlos shing zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams rang gi snying ga nas phyung la lha thams cad kyi gnas su ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag par bzhag nas /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' nyid bdag byin gyis brlab pa'i par du byas nas ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod par bya'o //

original: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //
analyzed: 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis //

original: grub pa'i rdo rje bla na med //
analyzed: grub pa'i rdo rje bla na med //
translated: the unsurpassed vajra of achievement.

original: bdag de bdag gi lag tu byin //
analyzed: bdag de bdag gi lag tu byin //

original: rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas ;
analyzed: rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas ;

original: / dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin no //
analyzed: / dang po sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin no //

analyzed: de nas de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi khams gsum las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba'i phyir /

analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che //
translated: “Vajrasattva, great vajra”

original: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: and ending with

analyzed: rang gi rigs ni bskyed par mdzod //🔽ces bya ba'i bar gyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad @78a * //

analyzed: pas bdag nyid la gsol ba gdab par bsam par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that one makes a request to oneself.

analyzed: de nas rdo rje bdag nyid kyi snying gar bzhag ste /
translated: Then, having placed the vajra at one’s heart,

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas 'di skad ces gsol to //
