original: dri dho me bha ba aa htya ro me bha ba aa pra ti ha ryo me bha ba /🔽sarba karma su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya:ku ru ha ha ha ha ho: de bzhin du 'dis khro bo tir'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
analyzed: dri dho me bha ba aa htya ro me bha ba aa pra ti ha ryo me bha ba / sarba karma su tsa me tsi ttam shre ya:ku ru ha ha ha ha ho: de bzhin du 'dis khro bo tir'inti ri'i phyag rgya bcings la /
translated: Dridho me bhava, aharaho me bhava, suposyo me bhava, sutosyo me bhava, anurakto me bhava, sarva siddhim me prayaccha, sarva karmasu ca me cittaṃ sreyam kuru hā hā hā hā hoḥ.

original: lag pa gnyis su dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: lag pa gnyis su dbab par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, having bound the Tīrntrika wrathful one's seal, one should cause to descend into both hands with this:

original: aom sa ma ya bra be sha mi /🔽de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan te /
analyzed: aom sa ma ya bra be sha mi / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad go rims ji lta ba bzhin du bstan te /
translated: Om samaya bhrūṁ.🔽Then, having shown the entire great maṇḍala in order, one should confer initiation upon Maheśvara and so forth with this:

original: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba 'di'i 'og nas bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po la sogs pa la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ratna aa bhi shinytsa zhes bya ba 'di'i 'og nas bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po la sogs pa la dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Om vajraratnābhiṣiñca.

original: de nas 'dis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i mtshan ma lag tu sbyin no //
analyzed: de nas 'dis khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pas rdo rje'i mtshan ma lag tu sbyin no //
translated: Then, with this [mantra], one should give the vajra insignia into the hand [of the disciple], with the [mantra] Vajravijayā and so forth.

original: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha ra tre badzra p'a ni hi ha ha ha ha /
analyzed: aom badzra aa bhi shinytsa sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra dha ra tre badzra p'a ni hi ha ha ha ha /
translated: Oṃ vajrābhiṣiñca sarvatathāgatavajradhara tre vajrapāṇi hi hi hi hi.

original: de'i rjes la ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la ming gi dbang bskur ba sbyin par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should give the empowerment of the name.

original: de nas ming rnams bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: de nas ming rnams bshad par bya ste /
translated: Then, the names should be explained.

original: 'di lta ste dbang phyug chen po ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i khro bo'o //
analyzed: 'di lta ste dbang phyug chen po ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i khro bo'o //
translated: Thus, Maheśvara is the wrathful one of the king of knowledge mantras.

original: khyab 'jug ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu ma'o //
analyzed: khyab 'jug ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i sgyu ma'o //
translated: Viṣṇu is the illusion of the king of knowledge mantras.

original: gzhon nu k'a rti ka ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i dril bu'o //
analyzed: gzhon nu k'a rti ka ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i dril bu'o //
translated: Kumārakārtikeya is the bell of the king of knowledge mantras.

original: tshangs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i thub pa'o //
analyzed: tshangs pa ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i thub pa'o //
translated: Brahmā is the sage of the king of knowledge mantras.

original: dbang po ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan cha zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbang po ni rig pa'i rgyal po'i mtshan cha zhes bya'o //
translated: Indra is called the weapon of the king of knowledge mantras.

original: bar sang la spyod pa rnams la nyi ma ni khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa'o //🔽zla ba ni khro bo rdo rje 'od do //
analyzed: bar sang la spyod pa rnams la nyi ma ni khro bo rdo rje 'khyil pa'o // zla ba ni khro bo rdo rje 'od do //
translated: For those who practice in the sky, the sun is the wrathful Vajra-Aṅkuśa.🔽The moon is the wrathful Vajraprabha.

original: spen pa ni khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa'o //
analyzed: spen pa ni khro bo rdo rje dbyug pa'o //
translated: Saturn is the wrathful Vajra-Daṇḍa.

original: mig dmar ni khro bo rdo rje gser smug ces bya'o //
analyzed: mig dmar ni khro bo rdo rje gser smug ces bya'o //
translated: Rakta-netra is called “Vajra-golden-brown wrathful one.”

original: nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams la stobs bzang ni tshogs kyi bdag po rdo rje glang po'i sna'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams la stobs bzang ni tshogs kyi bdag po rdo rje glang po'i sna'o //
translated: Among the sky-goers, Bhadra-bala is called “Vajra-elephant-nose lord of the gaṇas.”

original: sbrang rtsi byed pa ni tshogs kyi ba dag po rdo rje phreng ba'o //🔽rgyal ba ni tshogs kyi bdag po rdo rje dbang po'o //
analyzed: sbrang rtsi byed pa ni tshogs kyi ba dag po rdo rje phreng ba'o // rgyal ba ni tshogs kyi bdag po rdo rje dbang po'o //
translated: Madhu-kara is called “Vajra-garland lord of the gaṇas.”🔽Jina is called “Vajra-Indra lord of the gaṇas.”

original: rgyal bar byed pa ni tshogs kyi bdag po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o //🔽sa bla ba rnams la nor sbyin ni pho nya rdo rje thob pa'o //🔽rlung lha ni pho nya rdo rje rlung ngo //
analyzed: rgyal bar byed pa ni tshogs kyi bdag po rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o // sa bla ba rnams la nor sbyin ni pho nya rdo rje thob pa'o // rlung lha ni pho nya rdo rje rlung ngo //
translated: Jina-kara is called “Vajra-vijaya lord of the gaṇas.”🔽Among the earth-walkers, Vasudatta is called “Vajra-messenger.”🔽Vāyu is called “Vajra-wind messenger.”

original: me lha ni pho nya rdo rje me'o //
analyzed: me lha ni pho nya rdo rje me'o //
translated: Agni is called “Vajra-fire messenger.”

original: lus ngan ni pho nya rdo rje 'jigs pa zhes bya'o //
analyzed: lus ngan ni pho nya rdo rje 'jigs pa zhes bya'o //
translated: Kubera is called “Vajra-fear messenger.”

original: sa 'og nag nas ba rnams la phag ni bran rdo rje lcags kyu'o //🔽gshin rje bran rdo rje dus so //
analyzed: sa 'og nag nas ba rnams la phag ni bran rdo rje lcags kyu'o // gshin rje bran rdo rje dus so //
translated: Among the underworld beings, Varaha is called “Vajra-hook servant.”🔽Yama is called “Vajra-time servant.”

original: tshogs kyi bdag po ni bran rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o //
analyzed: tshogs kyi bdag po ni bran rdo rje bgegs kyi gtso bo'o //
translated: Gaṇapati is called “Vajra-obstacle-chief servant.”

original: chu lha ni bran klu'i rdo rje zhes bya'o //🔽au ma ni rdo rje'i rgyal mo khro mo rdo rje me'o //
analyzed: chu lha ni bran klu'i rdo rje zhes bya'o // au ma ni rdo rje'i rgyal mo khro mo rdo rje me'o //
translated: The water spirit is called “Nāgarāja Vajra.”🔽Umā is the vajra queen “Vajra Fire.”

original: rug ma ni rdo rje rgyal mo'i @80a * //🔽rdo rje gser ro //
analyzed: rug ma ni rdo rje rgyal mo'i @80a * // rdo rje gser ro //
translated: Rukma is the vajra queen “Vajra Gold.”

original: drug ldan ma ni rdo rje rgyal mo rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o //
analyzed: drug ldan ma ni rdo rje rgyal mo rdo rje gzhon nu ma'o //
translated: Ṣaṇmukha is the vajra queen “Vajra Youth.”

original: tshangs ma ni rdo rje rgyal mo rdo rje zhi ba ma'o //
analyzed: tshangs ma ni rdo rje rgyal mo rdo rje zhi ba ma'o //
translated: Brahmānī is the vajra queen “Vajra Peace.”

original: dbang mo ni rdo rje rgyal mo'i rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dbang mo ni rdo rje rgyal mo'i rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya'o //
translated: Indrāṇī is the vajra queen “Vajra Fist.”

original: bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med rnams la mi 'bam ci ni khro bo do rje mi 'chi ma'o //
analyzed: bar snang la spyod pa'i bud med rnams la mi 'bam ci ni khro bo do rje mi 'chi ma'o //
translated: Among the women who move in the sky, Abamā is the wrathful “Vajra Immortality.”

original: rdo rje ro hi ma ni khro bo rdo rje mdangs so //🔽dbyug 'dzin ma ni khro bo rdo rje dbyug mchog ma'o /
analyzed: rdo rje ro hi ma ni khro bo rdo rje mdangs so // dbyug 'dzin ma ni khro bo rdo rje dbyug mchog ma'o /
translated: Vajrarohinī is the wrathful “Vajra Radiance.”🔽Daṇḍadhāriṇī is the wrathful “Vajra Excellent Club.”

original: skye ba 'phrog ma ni khro bo rdo rje rked 'chi ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: skye ba 'phrog ma ni khro bo rdo rje rked 'chi ma zhes bya'o //
translated: Jātiharī is the wrathful “Vajra Waist-Ender.”

original: nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams la gsod ma ni gtso mo rdo rje 'dzum ma'o //
analyzed: nam mkha' la spyod pa rnams la gsod ma ni gtso mo rdo rje 'dzum ma'o //
translated: Among those who move in the sky, Ghātinī is the chief “Vajra Smile.”

original: za ba ma ni gtso mo rdo rje za ba ma'o //
analyzed: za ba ma ni gtso mo rdo rje za ba ma'o //
translated: Bhakṣaṇī is the chief “Vajra Eater.”

original: mgo ba ma ni gtso mo rdo rje mgo ba ma'o //
analyzed: mgo ba ma ni gtso mo rdo rje mgo ba ma'o //
translated: The chief Vajra-head is the head of the heads.

original: dga' ba ma ni gtso mo rdo rje dbang mo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: dga' ba ma ni gtso mo rdo rje dbang mo zhes bya'o //
translated: The chief Vajra-power is the joy of joys.

original: sa la spyod pa rnams la zhi ba mo ni pho nya mo'o //🔽rlung mo ni pho nya rdo rje mgyogs ma'o //
analyzed: sa la spyod pa rnams la zhi ba mo ni pho nya mo'o // rlung mo ni pho nya rdo rje mgyogs ma'o //
translated: Among those who act on the earth, the messenger is the peaceful one.🔽The messenger Vajra-swift is the wind.

original: me mo ni pho nya mo rdo rje 'bar ma'o //
analyzed: me mo ni pho nya mo rdo rje 'bar ma'o //
translated: The messenger Vajra-flame is the fire.

original: lus nga mo ni pho nya mo rdo rje 'khyor ma'o //
analyzed: lus nga mo ni pho nya mo rdo rje 'khyor ma'o //
translated: The messenger Vajra-wandering is the body.

original: sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma mo rnams la /
analyzed: sa 'og na gnas pa'i ma mo rnams la /
translated: Among the mātṛkās who dwell in the underworld,

original: phag mo ni bran mo rdo rje can ma'o //
analyzed: phag mo ni bran mo rdo rje can ma'o //
translated: the servant Vajra-holder is the pig.

original: tsa mund'i ni bran mo rdo rje dus ma'o //🔽sna can ma ni rdo rje rul pa ma'o //
analyzed: tsa mund'i ni bran mo rdo rje dus ma'o // sna can ma ni rdo rje rul pa ma'o //
translated: The servant Vajra-time is Caṇḍālī.🔽The Vajra-corpse is Pūtanā.

original: chu lha ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma zhes bya'o //
analyzed: chu lha ma ni rdo rje chu srin ma zhes bya'o //
translated: The Vajra-crocodile is Vāruṇī.

original: de nas rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'di ni rdo rje che //
translated: Then this vajra is the great vajra,

original: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs //
translated: blessed by all the buddhas.

original: dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni //
analyzed: dam tshig 'di las 'das na ni //
translated: If you transgress this pledge,

original: rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed //
analyzed: rigs rnams myur du thal bar byed //
translated: it will quickly reduce your family to ashes.

original: aom ha nna sa ma ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ha nna sa ma ya h'um phat /
translated: oṃ hana samayā hūṃ phaṭ

original: ces bya ba dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa 'dis lha chen po la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug go / sems dpa' rdo rje dam bya ste //
analyzed: ces bya ba dang / phyag rgya dang bcas pa 'dis lha chen po la sogs pa ma mo'i tshogs dang bcas pa rnams dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug go / sems dpa' rdo rje dam bya ste //
translated: The vajra being is to be made firm.

original: mthe bong gnyis ni bar gnan cing //
analyzed: mthe bong gnyis ni bar gnan cing //
translated: The two thumbs are pressed down in the middle,

original: mthe chung rdo rje rtse mor ni //
analyzed: mthe chung rdo rje rtse mor ni //
translated: and the two little fingers are at the tips of the vajra.

original: rnon po dam tshig 'dzin pa'o //
analyzed: rnon po dam tshig 'dzin pa'o //
translated: This is the commitment seal of the sharp one.

original: aom ba li ta ba li ta badzra a'a karsha ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas lha chen po la sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams bka' bsgo pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom ba li ta ba li ta badzra a'a karsha ya h'um dza: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas lha chen po la sogs pa'i rgyal po rnams bka' bsgo pa la sbyar bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra oṃ balita balita vajra ākarṣaya hūṃ jaḥ and its seal, one should employ the great gods and so forth, the kings, to carry out one’s orders.

original: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /🔽rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
analyzed: de la phyag rgya ni 'di yin te / rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
translated: The seal is as follows:🔽Having formed the two vajra seals,

original: mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni //
analyzed: mdzub mo lcags kyur bcings nas ni //
translated: one should form the two index fingers into hooks,

original: gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya //
analyzed: gcu zhing phyir yang gcu bar bya //
translated: bend them, and then bend them again.

original: lha rnams dgug pa dam pa yin //
analyzed: lha rnams dgug pa dam pa yin //
translated: This is the supreme summoning of the gods.

original: h'um badzra aa kri pa ta ya sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas ni khro bo rnams so //
analyzed: h'um badzra aa kri pa ta ya sa ma ya h'um zhes bya bas ni khro bo rnams so //
translated: With hūṃ vajra akṛptapaṭaya samaya hūṃ, one should summon the wrathful ones.

original: 'di'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgya ni /
translated: The seal for this is:

original: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
translated: Having made the binding of the vajra,

original: mdzub mo bkug nas rab tu mnan //🔽mthe bong gnyis ka mtshams sbyar nas //
analyzed: mdzub mo bkug nas rab tu mnan // mthe bong gnyis ka mtshams sbyar nas //
translated: one should bend the index fingers and press them down.🔽Having joined the two thumbs,

original: gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ka rab tu mnan //
translated: one should press down the two middle fingers.

original: aom badzra ma la aa kra bam zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pa ni tshogs @80b rnams so //
analyzed: aom badzra ma la aa kra bam zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pa ni tshogs @80b rnams so //
translated: With the words Om vajra-mala akra-vam, together with the seal, one should make offerings to the assembly.

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: The seal is as follows:

original: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi /🔽mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis ka yi / mthe'u chung sor mo bcings nas ni //
translated: Having bound the two vajra seals,🔽one should bind the two little fingers,

original: mdzub mo sor mo rgya nas mdud //
analyzed: mdzub mo sor mo rgya nas mdud //
translated: and having extended the two index fingers, one should tie them in a knot.

original: bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya //
analyzed: bzlog ste mgo bor gzhag par bya //
translated: One should reverse them and place them on one's head.

original: aom badzra bhandha ham zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas ni pho ya rnams so //
analyzed: aom badzra bhandha ham zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas ni pho ya rnams so //
translated: With the words Om vajra-bandha ham, together with the seal, one should make offerings to the male spirits.

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: The seal is as follows:

original: rdo rje bsrung ba dam bcings te /
analyzed: rdo rje bsrung ba dam bcings te /
translated: Having made the binding of the vajra protection,

original: rdo rje bsdams pa des mnan pa //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa des mnan pa //
translated: one should press down with that vajra binding.

original: 'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste //
analyzed: 'di ni sa yi dam tshig ste //
translated: This is the pledge of the earth,

original: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'o //
analyzed: sems can thams cad bsrung ba'o //
translated: the protection of all sentient beings.

original: aom badzra p'a l'a bhanytsa bhanytsa h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a l'a bhanytsa bhanytsa h'um phat /
translated: Om vajra-pala bhanja bhanja hum phat.

original: ces bya ba ni bran rnams so //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni bran rnams so //
translated: These are the servants.

original: 'di'i phyag rgya ni //🔽rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgya ni // rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings te //
translated: Their seal is:🔽Form the two vajra seals,

original: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mos mnan//
analyzed: g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mos mnan//
translated: and press down with the left vajra forefinger.

original: gcu zhing slar gcu byas nas ni /
analyzed: gcu zhing slar gcu byas nas ni /
translated: Twisting and twisting again,

original: mthe'u chung gnyis ni brdab par bya //🔽aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ye h'um phat /
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis ni brdab par bya // aom he ru ka badzra sa ma ye h'um phat /
translated: the two little fingers should be snapped.🔽Oṃ heruka vajra samaye hūṃ phaṭ

original: sarba dushta sa ma ya mudzdza pra bha nytsa ka h'um phat /
analyzed: sarba dushta sa ma ya mudzdza pra bha nytsa ka h'um phat /
translated: Sarva duṣṭa samaya mūjana prabhāṇaka haṃ phaṭ

analyzed: 'di ni dbu ma la sogs pa'i ma mo'i tshogs rnams so //
translated: These are the host of mātṛkās, beginning with the central one.

original: 'di'i phyag rgya ni /
analyzed: 'di'i phyag rgya ni /
translated: Their seal is:

original: rdo rje bcing ba sbrel pa ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba sbrel pa ni //
translated: The two vajra bindings

original: mdzub mo gnyis ni dam por bya //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis ni dam por bya //
translated: are made with the two forefingers.

original: mthe bong gung mo rtsa mo gnyis //
analyzed: mthe bong gung mo rtsa mo gnyis //
translated: The two tips of the thumbs and middle fingers🔽are joined together.

original: rdo rje phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
analyzed: rdo rje phyag rgya bcings nas kyang //
translated: Form the vajra seal,🔽reverse it, and place it on the forehead.

original: yongs su bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag / mthe bo khar ni gzhag par bya //
analyzed: yongs su bzlog ste dpral bar gzhag / mthe bo khar ni gzhag par bya //
translated: Place the thumbs in the mouth.

original: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um phat /
analyzed: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ sumbha ni sumbha hūṃ phaṭ

original: ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom badzra sa ma ya a'a karsha ya sarba dushta mandalam badzra dha nga sa tyam m'a ti kra ma h'um phat /

translated: Om vajra samaya akaraya sarva dushtanam mandala vajra dhang satyam mathika krama hum phat.

analyzed: ces bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang bcas pas ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor dgug par bya'o //
translated: This is the summoning of the mandala of the wicked together with the seal.

analyzed: rdo rje lcags kyu gnyis bcings te //
translated: Form the two vajra hooks,

analyzed: snying gar yongs su bskor bar bya // mdzub gnyis lcags kyu phyi rol gyi //
translated: and turn them around at the heart.🔽The two thumbs are the hook,

analyzed: dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i mchog yin no ;
translated: the best for summoning the outer mandala.

original: / yang aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um phat /
analyzed: / yang aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um phat /
translated: Om sumbhani sumbha hum phat.🔽This is the word of Vairochana.

original: ces bya ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi bka' dang / aom dushta badzra kro dha ha nan nga ha pa tsa pidhva nsa ya bi ki ra sarba du sht'am sa ma ya mu da na mandala bha nydza bhanydza marda marda kha dha kha dha ba ra mantram badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: ces bya ba'i rnam par snang mdzad kyi bka' dang / aom dushta badzra kro dha ha nan nga ha pa tsa pidhva nsa ya bi ki ra sarba du sht'am sa ma ya mu da na mandala bha nydza bhanydza marda marda kha dha kha dha ba ra mantram badzra h'um phat /
translated: Om dushtavajra krodha hanan ghanapacha pidhana sa sarva dushtanam samaya mudra mandala bhanja bhanja marda marda kha dha kha dha vara mantra vajra hum phat.

original: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya dang bcas pas ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhig par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba ni phyag rgya dang bcas pas ma rungs pa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhig par bya'o //
translated: Thus, with the mudra, one should destroy the mandala of the wicked.

original: rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par //
translated: The vajra wrathful one is excellent with the index finger,

original: sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang //
analyzed: sen mo sprad de dkris nas kyang //
translated: the nail touching, and twisting,

original: rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba //
analyzed: rtse mo gnyis ni dam sbyar ba //
translated: the two tips firmly joined.

original: phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms //
analyzed: phyag rgya 'di ni ma rungs 'joms //
translated: This mudra conquers the wicked.

original: aom ni sumbha ha na da ha pa tsa grihna bhandha h'um phat /
analyzed: aom ni sumbha ha na da ha pa tsa grihna bhandha h'um phat /
translated: Om nishumbha hanadha pacha grihna bandha hum phat.

original: ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / @81a * //
analyzed: ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / @81a * //
translated: Thus, with the words of the Tathagata,

original: aom mah'a badzra kr'u ra kro dha pa ta ye sarba du sht'am mandalam bi n'a sha ya /
analyzed: aom mah'a badzra kr'u ra kro dha pa ta ye sarba du sht'am mandalam bi n'a sha ya /
translated: Om maha vajra krodha pataye sarva dushtanam mandalambhi nasaya,

original: sarba dushta sa ma yam ba ki ra bi dhvangs ya spho ta ya /
analyzed: sarba dushta sa ma yam ba ki ra bi dhvangs ya spho ta ya /
translated: sarva dushtasamyamavaki vidhvamsaya spotaya,

original: bha nydza sarba dusht'am sa ma ya mu dra bandha /
analyzed: bha nydza sarba dusht'am sa ma ya mu dra bandha /
translated: bhandha sarva dushtasamyama mudra bandha.

original: grihna ha na da ha pa tsa sarba dusht'am sa ma ya sa tv'am badzra sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ba dang khro bo chen po gdug pa phyag dang zhal stong mnga' bas ma rungs pa thams cad bcom nas rgya mtsho chen por ltung bar byas par
analyzed: grihna ha na da ha pa tsa sarba dusht'am sa ma ya sa tv'am badzra sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ba dang khro bo chen po gdug pa phyag dang zhal stong mnga' bas ma rungs pa thams cad bcom nas rgya mtsho chen por ltung bar byas par
translated: Then, with Gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hana daha pacha sarvaduṣṭān samaya sthaṃ vajra samaya hūṃ phaṭ, the great wrathful one with a thousand faces and hands subdues all the wicked ones and makes them fall into the great ocean.

original: bsam mo // de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad de /🔽g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la //
analyzed: bsam mo // de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad de / g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la //
translated: Then, its mudrā is explained:🔽On the left vajra forefinger,

original: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas gzung //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo bkug pas gzung //
translated: the right forefinger is bent and held.

original: rab tu khros nas drag gtogs nas //
analyzed: rab tu khros nas drag gtogs nas //
translated: Very wrathful, with fierce ferocity,

original: ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed //🔽aom ha na ha na badzra h'um phat ;
analyzed: ri rab kyang ni lhung bar byed // aom ha na ha na badzra h'um phat ;
translated: even Mount Meru would be made to fall.

original: ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom badzra a'a karsha ya sh'i ghram sarba dusht'am da ha na badzra dha ra sate na h'um dza: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas phra men la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom badzra a'a karsha ya sh'i ghram sarba dusht'am da ha na badzra dha ra sate na h'um dza: zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas phra men la sogs pa gdon ma rungs pa thams cad dgug par bya'o //
translated: With the words of the Tathāgata, Oṃ hana hana vajra hūṃ phaṭ, and with the mudrā, Oṃ vajra ākarṣaya śighraṃ sarvaduṣṭān daha vajra dhāra stena hūṃ jaḥ, all the wicked grahas such as the piśāca and so on are summoned.

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /🔽g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la /
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te / g-yon pa'i rdo rje mdzub mo la /
translated: The mudra is as follows:🔽With the left vajra forefinger

original: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus gzung //
analyzed: g-yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyus gzung //
translated: the right forefinger is held with a hook.

original: rab tu khros shing dgug pa yis //
analyzed: rab tu khros shing dgug pa yis //
translated: With great wrath and summoning

original: gdon rnams thams cad dbang du byed //
analyzed: gdon rnams thams cad dbang du byed //
translated: all the spirits are brought under control.🔽Oṃ vajra-pratigrihna hṛdaya ākarṣaya adya satva ardha-nayate tasya hṛdayaṃ niścāmaya samaya hūṃ ja

original: aom badzra pra ti gri hanhri da ya a'a karsha a'adya yan satva aardhe na mri ya te ta sya hra da yam nishtha ma tu sa ma ya h'um dza zhes bya ba dang / phyag rgya 'dis 'chi bar gyur pa de rnams kyi mtshan mo snying chung ba la phra man ma gdon rnams la sbyin no //
analyzed: aom badzra pra ti gri hanhri da ya a'a karsha a'adya yan satva aardhe na mri ya te ta sya hra da yam nishtha ma tu sa ma ya h'um dza zhes bya ba dang / phyag rgya 'dis 'chi bar gyur pa de rnams kyi mtshan mo snying chung ba la phra man ma gdon rnams la sbyin no //
translated: With this mudra and mantra, at night one should give the heart of those who have died to the spirits.

original: de rnams dga' ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par byed do //
analyzed: de rnams dga' ste thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes grub par byed do //
translated: They will be pleased and will accomplish the wisdom of omniscience.

original: phyag rgya de ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: phyag rgya de ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mudra is as follows:

original: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba byas nas ni //
translated: Having made the vajra bond,

original: lag ngar snying gar shin tu bsdams //
analyzed: lag ngar snying gar shin tu bsdams //
translated: the forearms are tightly bound at the heart.

original: rdo rje mdzub mo rang mchan khung //
analyzed: rdo rje mdzub mo rang mchan khung //
translated: The vajra forefingers are in one's armpits.

original: brud pa yi ni snying sbyin no //
analyzed: brud pa yi ni snying sbyin no //
translated: One should give the heart of those who have died.

original: aom h'um phat ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom badzra sa ma ya aa na ya sarba dushta dzva r'a di na a'a karsha ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom h'um phat ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom badzra sa ma ya aa na ya sarba dushta dzva r'a di na a'a karsha ya h'um phat /
translated: Reciting Om vajra samaya anaya sarva dushtan jvara adi na akarshaya hum phat!

original: ces zlos shing phyag rgya dang bcas pas rims la sogs pa dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: ces zlos shing phyag rgya dang bcas pas rims la sogs pa dgug par bya'o //
translated: with the mudra, one should summon fevers and so forth.

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /🔽mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te / mdzub mo gnyis kyi rtse mo ni //
translated: The mudra is as follows:🔽The tips of the two index fingers

original: mthe bong gnyi ga'i drung du ni //
analyzed: mthe bong gnyi ga'i drung du ni //
translated: are placed in front of the two thumbs

original: yid kyis khros nas btsir bar bya //
analyzed: yid kyis khros nas btsir bar bya //
translated: and squeezed with the mind wrathfully.

original: rims la sogs par dgug par bya //🔽aom badzra karma bi sho dha ya sarba a'a ba ra na ni buddha satye na sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pas rang ngam gzhan gyi rims la sogs pa'i nad bsal bar bya'o //
analyzed: rims la sogs par dgug par bya // aom badzra karma bi sho dha ya sarba a'a ba ra na ni buddha satye na sa ma ya h'um zhes bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pas rang ngam gzhan gyi rims la sogs pa'i nad bsal bar bya'o //
translated: One should summon fevers and so forth.🔽With this mantra Om vajra karma vishodhaya sarva avarana ni buddhasatyenasamaya hum!

original: de la phyag /
analyzed: de la phyag /
translated: one should remove one's own or another's fever and so forth, together with the mudra.

original: @81b rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: @81b rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mudra is as follows:

original: rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo dam sbyar te //
translated: Having firmly joined the vajra palms,

original: gung mo gnyis ka bkug nas su //
analyzed: gung mo gnyis ka bkug nas su //
translated: the two middle fingers are bent

original: mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas //
analyzed: mthe bo rab tu mnyam sbyar bas //
translated: and the thumbs are fully joined.

original: mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o //
analyzed: mnan pa de ni sdig 'phrog pa'o //
translated: This is the suppression of the evil.

original: aom kasha pa ya badzra sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom kasha pa ya badzra sv'a h'a /
translated: Oṃ kṣapāyavajra svāhā.🔽 With this mantra of the Tathāgata, and with the mantra Oṃ sarvapāpa ākarṣaṇa viśodhana vajra samaya hūṃ phaṭ,

original: zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom sarba aa pa ya a'a karsha na bi shva dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan song gsum po dgug par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' dang / aom sarba aa pa ya a'a karsha na bi shva dha na badzra sa ma ya h'um phat ces bya ba 'dis phyag rgya dang bcas pas ngan song gsum po dgug par bya'o //
translated: together with the mudrā, one should summon the three lower realms.

original: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /🔽rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
analyzed: phyag rgya ni 'di yin te / rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis nang du //
translated: The mudrā is as follows:🔽The two vajra-fists

original: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas kyang //
analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis ni bcings nas kyang //
translated: are clenched with the two index fingers

original: legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni //
analyzed: legs par gyen du 'phangs pa ni //
translated: and well raised upwards.

original: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
analyzed: ltung ba slong ba'i dam pa'o //
translated: This is the supreme mudrā for raising downfalls.🔽With the mantra Oṃ vajrapāṇi viśphoṭaya sarvapāpabandhanān pramokṣaya sarvapāyagatibhyaḥ sarvatrāṇa sarvatathāgatavajra samaya traṭ,

original: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya sarba a'a pa ya bandha n'a ni pra mo kasha ya sarba a'a pa ya ga ti bhya: sarba tv'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya trat ces bya ba 'dis ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam par
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni bi spho ta ya sarba a'a pa ya bandha n'a ni pra mo kasha ya sarba a'a pa ya ga ti bhya: sarba tv'a na sarba ta th'a ga ta badzra sa ma ya trat ces bya ba 'dis ngan 'gro'i 'gro ba thams cad rnam par
translated: one should summon all beings of the lower realms.

original: sbyangs la / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes par bsam par bya'o //
analyzed: sbyangs la / bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi zhabs drung du skyes par bsam par bya'o //
translated: Then, one should imagine that one is born in the presence of the Bhagavat Vairocana.

original: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad de /🔽rdo rje bcing ba dam bcings te //
analyzed: de nas 'di'i phyag rgya bshad de / rdo rje bcing ba dam bcings te //
translated: Then, his seal is explained:🔽Having made the binding of the vajra-bond,

original: gung mo ga nyi ga ngos sbyar nas //
analyzed: gung mo ga nyi ga ngos sbyar nas //
translated: the two thumbs are joined to the front

original: tha ma bzhi yang rtse phrad pa //
analyzed: tha ma bzhi yang rtse phrad pa //
translated: and the four [other] fingers also meet at the tips.

original: skad cig du ni sdig dral lo //
analyzed: skad cig du ni sdig dral lo //
translated: In an instant, the sin is destroyed.

original: rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samadhi called “the supreme king of the mandala of vajra wrath.”

original: de nas bsdu ba byas la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having gathered [the mandala], one should be consecrated by all the Buddhas just as one is.

original: yang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas la /
analyzed: yang dgug pa dang gzhug pa dang / bcing pa dang / dbang du byas la /
translated: Again, having summoned, caused to enter, bound, and subdued,

original: ji ltar yongs su bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su lha thams cad phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par byas nas phyag rgya chen pos rang gi las mdzad pa la sbyar bar bya'o ;
analyzed: ji ltar yongs su bsgom pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su lha thams cad phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab par byas nas phyag rgya chen pos rang gi las mdzad pa la sbyar bar bya'o ;
translated: having sealed all the deities with the four seals in the place of the mandala as one has visualized them, one should apply the great seal to one’s own rite.

original: / rdo rje khro bo las kyi mchog //
analyzed: / rdo rje khro bo las kyi mchog //
translated: The supreme action of the vajra wrathful one.

original: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
analyzed: ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to //
translated: This is the samadhi.

original: dang por sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po'i mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms par 'jug par bya'o zhes gsungs pas ting nge 'dzin gsum po 'di dag ni nges par bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po mchog dang las kyi rgyal po'i mchog gi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pas snyoms par 'jug par bya'o zhes gsungs pas ting nge 'dzin gsum po 'di dag ni nges par bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should enter into meditative equipoise through the samadhis of the supreme king of mandalas and the supreme king of actions, as stated in the first application. Therefore, these three samadhis should definitely be cultivated.

original: yang bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas ji lta ba bzhin du bstod par bya'o //
analyzed: yang bsdu ba byas la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas ji lta ba bzhin du bstod par bya'o //
translated: Then, having performed the gathering, one should praise as in the one hundred and eight names.

original: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas la mchod yon phul nas thams cad rang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la /🔽dbang bskur la me tog la sogs pa dam pa brgyad @82a * //
analyzed: de nas lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas la mchod yon phul nas thams cad rang gi phyag rgya bzhis rgyas btab la / dbang bskur la me tog la sogs pa dam pa brgyad @82a * //
translated: Then, having performed the actions with the hook and so forth, having offered the welcome offering, all should be sealed with one's own four seals.🔽Having conferred empowerment, one should make proper offerings with the eight supreme offerings such as flowers,

original: dam mchod pa bcu drug gis yang dag bar mchod la /
analyzed: dam mchod pa bcu drug gis yang dag bar mchod la /
translated: and the sixteen offerings.

original: phyag bzhi byas nas phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bcings nas rdo rje bdag nyid can dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang / bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis sems dpa' thams cad dang bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas /
analyzed: phyag bzhi byas nas phyag rgya chen po ji lta ba bzhin du bcings nas rdo rje bdag nyid can dang rang bzhin gyis dag pa dang / bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis sems dpa' thams cad dang bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas /
translated: Having made four prostrations, having bound the great seal just as it is, having contemplated the sameness of all heroes by means of the vajra nature, the natural purity, and the selflessness,

original: khro bo'i tshig gam rdo rje'i tshig gam /
analyzed: khro bo'i tshig gam rdo rje'i tshig gam /
translated: one should recite the wrathful words or the vajra words,

original: yid nyid kyis h'um bzhi zlos shing chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes kyi dbang du byas la /
analyzed: yid nyid kyis h'um bzhi zlos shing chos bdag med pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyis ye shes kyi dbang du byas la /
translated: or with the mind itself, reciting the four hūṃs, having brought to mind the gnosis that is the sameness of the selflessness of phenomena,

original: ji srid so sor snang ba'i sbyor bas khro bo'i 'khor lor gtogs pa thams cad bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: ji srid so sor snang ba'i sbyor bas khro bo'i 'khor lor gtogs pa thams cad bsgom par bya'o //
translated: one should contemplate all those belonging to the wrathful wheel by means of the yoga of individual appearance.

original: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang h'um bzhi'i sgra byung bar lhag par mos par bya'o //
analyzed: lha thams cad kyi zhal nas kyang h'um bzhi'i sgra byung bar lhag par mos par bya'o //
translated: One should imagine that the sound of the four hūṃs arises from the mouths of all the deities.

original: bsgom pa nye bar sdud pa'i dus su yang de bzhin du yid kyis legs par sbyor bas rang gi lus la gzhug par bya zhing bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na bzhugs ba'am ;
analyzed: bsgom pa nye bar sdud pa'i dus su yang de bzhin du yid kyis legs par sbyor bas rang gi lus la gzhug par bya zhing bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i dbus na bzhugs ba'am ;
translated: One should meditate on oneself as dwelling in the middle of the gathering of all the Tathāgatas,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad gcig por bsgom par bya ba'am /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad gcig por bsgom par bya ba'am /
translated: or as just Vajra Hūṃkara,

original: mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i na gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus pa'i na gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad bsgom par bya'o //
translated: or as the Blessed Vajra Hūṃkara dwelling in the middle of the gathering of all the Tathāgatas in front of oneself.

original: sbyor ba 'dis ni //
analyzed: sbyor ba 'dis ni //
translated: By this practice,

original: sangs rgyas bka' yi 'gro kun don //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bka' yi 'gro kun don //
translated: all the aims of the world through the Buddha’s word,

original: dngos grub kun gyi cho ga yis //
analyzed: dngos grub kun gyi cho ga yis //
translated: through the rite of all powers,

original: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni //
analyzed: phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni //
translated: if one meditates on the great seal,

original: tshe 'di nyid la 'chad rgya'o //
analyzed: tshe 'di nyid la 'chad rgya'o //
translated: one will become a Buddha in this very life.

original: gal te gang gi tshe phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa lhod par gyur tam bdag nyid gtong bar 'dod par gyur na da'i tshe yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
analyzed: gal te gang gi tshe phyag rgyar byin gyis brlabs pa lhod par gyur tam bdag nyid gtong bar 'dod par gyur na da'i tshe yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya'o //
translated: If at any time the consecration as a seal becomes slack, or if one wishes to give it up, then one should stabilize it with the hundred-syllable [mantra].

original: bsgom pas dub par gyur na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang / mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang phyag bzhi bya'o //
analyzed: bsgom pas dub par gyur na mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang / mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang phyag bzhi bya'o //
translated: When one becomes tired of meditating, one should praise with the one hundred and eight names, make the eight offerings, and make four prostrations.

original: de ltar ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should meditate for as long as one does not become weary.

original: skyo bar gyur na mtshan rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang mchod pa thams cad dang / phyag bzhi byas nas /
analyzed: skyo bar gyur na mtshan rtsa brgyad kyis bstod pa dang mchod pa thams cad dang / phyag bzhi byas nas /
translated: When one becomes weary, one should praise with the one hundred and eight names, make all the offerings, and make four prostrations.

original: aom badzra sa tva h'um dza: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po gso bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra sa tva h'um dza: zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po gso bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the mantra Oṃ vajrasattva hūṃ jaḥ and the corresponding seal, one should revive the great god.

original: de yang 'di yin te /
analyzed: de yang 'di yin te /
translated: This is it:

original: gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdams byas te //
analyzed: gsang ba'i lcags kyu bsdams byas te //
translated: Having made the secret hook,

original: tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas ni //
analyzed: tha ma mnyam du brkyang nas ni //
translated: one should extend the tips equally.

original: shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni //
analyzed: shi ba'i mgo bor bzhag na ni //
translated: If one places it on the head of the dead,

original: srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur //
analyzed: srog ni phyir yang thob par 'gyur //
translated: life will be regained.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du gzhibs nas @82b mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur bya ba ni gsang ba'i lcags kyu'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa nang du gzhibs nas @82b mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyur bya ba ni gsang ba'i lcags kyu'o //
translated: The secret hook is to interlock the vajra-binding and make the two index fingers into hooks.

original: de nas aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa rkang pa'i 'og nas gtang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas aom badzra mu: zhes bya ba 'di phyag rgya dang ldan pas lha chen po chung ma dang bcas pa rkang pa'i 'og nas gtang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the mantra OṀ Vajra MUṀ, together with the gesture, one should send forth the Great God with his wife from under one's foot.

original: de ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is it:

original: rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par //
analyzed: rdo rje khro bo mdzub legs par //
translated: The vajra wrathful one is well-formed with the index finger,

original: zur sprad bsdams te gzhag pa ni //
analyzed: zur sprad bsdams te gzhag pa ni //
translated: the corner joined and held.

original: rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing //
analyzed: rdo rje de dag bsgyur byas shing //
translated: Having transformed those vajras,

original: 'og nas yang dag 'byin par byed //
analyzed: 'og nas yang dag 'byin par byed //
translated: one should send them forth from below.

original: badzro ttishtha zhes bya bas kyang slar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: badzro ttishtha zhes bya bas kyang slar dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra VAJROTTISHTA, one should also consecrate them again.

original: aom tsandro tta re sa manta bha dra kir ni mbh'a badzr'i ni h'um zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang bcas pa bya ste /
analyzed: aom tsandro tta re sa manta bha dra kir ni mbh'a badzr'i ni h'um zhes bya ba ni phyag rgya dang bcas pa bya ste /
translated: With the mantra OṀ Candrottara SAMANTA BHADRA KIRIN MRA BHA VAJRI NI HUM, together with the gesture, one should do this.

original: de ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de ni 'di yin te /
translated: This is it:

original: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
analyzed: rdo rje bcing ba dam byas te //
translated: Having made the firm vajra bond,

original: mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam por ni //
analyzed: mthe bong mthe'u chung mnyam por ni //
translated: the thumbs and little fingers are even,

original: mnyam nas legs par brkyang ba ni //
analyzed: mnyam nas legs par brkyang ba ni //
translated: evenly extended,

original: zla ba'i ri mo zhes kyang grags //
analyzed: zla ba'i ri mo zhes kyang grags //
translated: known as the 'moon mark'.

original: lha mo au ma yang sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
analyzed: lha mo au ma yang sngar bshad pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la /
translated: Goddess Umā is also empowered by the empowerment of the precious vajra as explained above.

original: lha chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis legs par mchod de /
analyzed: lha chen po gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhis legs par mchod de /
translated: The great god should be properly worshipped with the four secret offerings.

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas mchod yon phul la /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub kyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngos nas mchod yon phul la /
translated: For the sake of the desired spiritual powers, one should dedicate the roots of virtue, offer a libation,

original: phyag rgya de dgrol bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa la bzod par gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyag rgya de dgrol bar byas nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa la bzod par gsol bar bya'o //
translated: and release that consort. One should request forbearance from the Blessed One and all the tathāgatas.

original: bcom ldan 'das bdag so so'i skye bor gyur pas cho ga lhag chad du gyur pa gang ci bgyis pa de thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig ces bzod pa gsol bar bya'o //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das bdag so so'i skye bor gyur pas cho ga lhag chad du gyur pa gang ci bgyis pa de thams cad bdag la bzod par mdzod cig ces bzod pa gsol bar bya'o //
translated: “Blessed One, please forgive whatever I have done that is deficient or excessive in the ritual, being an ordinary person.” In this way, one should request forbearance.

original: de nas gshegs su gsol ba'i phyir bskul bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas gshegs su gsol ba'i phyir bskul bar bya ste /
translated: Then, in order to request them to depart, one should exhort them:

original: aom khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
analyzed: aom khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don kun mdzad //
translated: Oṃ, you who act for the benefit of all beings,

original: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
analyzed: rjes su mthun pa'i dngos grub stsol //
translated: grant the appropriate spiritual powers,

original: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas yul du gshegs su gsol //
translated: and please return to your buddha realm.

original: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
analyzed: slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol //
translated: Please return again.🔽With the four hums of the wrathful deity Hayagriva, ending with muh,

original: zhes ba ngad khro bo ti r'inta ri'i h'um bzhis mu: zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang ldan pa gyen du dgrol lo //
analyzed: zhes ba ngad khro bo ti r'inta ri'i h'um bzhis mu: zhes bya ba'i mtha' dang ldan pa gyen du dgrol lo //
translated: one should release it upward.

original: de lta bus ni thams cad gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bus ni thams cad gshegs su gsol bar 'gyur ro //
translated: In this way, one should request all to depart.

original: ji ltar sprul pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du yid kyis legs par sbyor bas /
analyzed: ji ltar sprul pa'i rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad kyang de bzhin du yid kyis legs par sbyor bas /
translated: Just as the emanation and the retinue of the mandala, so also all should be properly imagined with the mind.

original: rang gi lus la bcug la yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste /
analyzed: rang gi lus la bcug la yi ge brgya pas brtan par bya ste /
translated: Having caused them to enter one's body, one should stabilize them with the hundred-syllable mantra.

original: rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas shing /
analyzed: rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas shing /
translated: Reciting the vajra essence mantra once,

original: rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems pa'i gtsug tor dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyi bdag nyid srung ba byas nas /
analyzed: rdo rje go cha dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / rdo rje sems pa'i gtsug tor dang / rdo rje khu tshur gyi bdag nyid srung ba byas nas /
translated: one should perform the protection of the nature of the vajra armor, vajra yaksha, vajra essence crown protuberance, and vajra fist.

original: rang gi lha'i @83a * //
analyzed: rang gi lha'i @83a * //
translated: With the pride of one's deity,

original: nga rgyal dang ldan pa nyid kyis ldang bar bya'o //
analyzed: nga rgyal dang ldan pa nyid kyis ldang bar bya'o //
translated: one should arise.

original: de ltar nyin re bzhin thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam /
analyzed: de ltar nyin re bzhin thun bzhir zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam /
translated: In this way, in four sessions each day, for one month, six months,

original: lo gcig gam /
analyzed: lo gcig gam /
translated: one year,

original: dus ji srid kyi lha rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba stsal ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: dus ji srid kyi lha rnams kyi rjes su gnang ba stsal ba de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: One should meditate for as long as one is permitted by the deities.

original: mi nus pas ni rnal 'byor chen po nyin re bzhin lan cig bsgoms la sngags thams cad kyi bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
analyzed: mi nus pas ni rnal 'byor chen po nyin re bzhin lan cig bsgoms la sngags thams cad kyi bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o //
translated: Those who are unable [to meditate for so long] should meditate once a day, and recite all the mantras one hundred thousand times.

original: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
analyzed: sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga'o //
translated: This is the rite of preliminary practice.

original: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste /🔽nyin re'am ni zla ba re //
analyzed: de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor bri bar bya ste / nyin re'am ni zla ba re //
translated: After that, one should draw the maṇḍala.🔽Either every day or every month,

original: lo ni re re nyid dag tu //🔽yar gyi ngo la cho ga bzhin //
analyzed: lo ni re re nyid dag tu // yar gyi ngo la cho ga bzhin //
translated: or every year,🔽on the waxing [moon], according to the rite,

original: bsgrub bya ji ltar mngon 'dod bri //
analyzed: bsgrub bya ji ltar mngon 'dod bri //
translated: one should draw the maṇḍala as one wishes.

original: de la rgyal po ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu pa'o //
analyzed: de la rgyal po ni khru brgya'am lnga bcu pa'o //
translated: There, the king's [maṇḍala] is one hundred cubits or fifty cubits.

original: blon po'am blon po chen po ni khru lnga bcu pa'am nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
analyzed: blon po'am blon po chen po ni khru lnga bcu pa'am nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o //
translated: The minister's or the great minister's is fifty cubits or twenty-five cubits.

original: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyi ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'am de'i phyed do //
analyzed: tshong dpon nam ded dpon gyi ni khru nyi shu rtsa lnga'am de'i phyed do //
translated: The merchant's or caravan leader's is twenty-five cubits or half of that.

original: sgrub pa po khru bcu gnyis sam /
analyzed: sgrub pa po khru bcu gnyis sam /
translated: The practitioner's is twelve cubits,

original: khru drug gam ji tsam nus pa la bya'o //
analyzed: khru drug gam ji tsam nus pa la bya'o //
translated: six cubits, or as much as one can manage.

original: de la dang po re zhig yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de la dang po re zhig yo byad thams cad dang ldan pas /
translated: First, having all the articles,

original: mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su /
analyzed: mngon par 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su /
translated: in the center of the maṇḍala platform that is desired,

original: mi rus kyi phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bsal nas /
analyzed: mi rus kyi phye mas dkyil 'khor gyi bgegs bsal nas /
translated: having removed the obstructors of the maṇḍala with human bone ash,

original: bdag dang slob ma la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
analyzed: bdag dang slob ma la sogs pa zhi bar byed pa'i sbyin sreg bya'o //
translated: one should perform the homa that pacifies oneself, the disciples, and so on.

original: de nas sa sbyang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de nas sa sbyang bar bya ste /
translated: Then, one should purify the ground.

original: zabs su 'dom gang tsam la khru gang tsam brkos la /
analyzed: zabs su 'dom gang tsam la khru gang tsam brkos la /
translated: Having dug one cubit deep,

original: dri zhim pos bran pa'i sas bkang nas /
analyzed: dri zhim pos bran pa'i sas bkang nas /
translated: fill it with earth scented with perfume,

original: rdo rje rtse mo mngon par bzlas pa'i chus chag chag btab la legs par bcags te /
analyzed: rdo rje rtse mo mngon par bzlas pa'i chus chag chag btab la legs par bcags te /
translated: sprinkle it with water incanted with the Vajraśekhara mantra, and level it well.

original: shin tu mnyam par byas la sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud par byas la mtha' mar legs par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dam pa dang /
analyzed: shin tu mnyam par byas la sgo bzhi dang skar khung gis yongs su bskor ba rta babs bzhis mdzes par byas pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang du chud par byas la mtha' mar legs par bris shing dril bu btags pa'i rgyal mtshan dam pa dang /
translated: Having made it completely even, having made it fit inside a multistoried building completely surrounded by four doors and windows, beautified by four architraves, and having hung excellent banners with bells around the perimeter,

original: bla re mchog bres pa /
analyzed: bla re mchog bres pa /
translated: one should hang a supreme canopy.

original: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris kyis mdzes par byas la /
analyzed: sangs rgyas rin po che la sogs pa'i ras ris kyis mdzes par byas la /
translated: It should be beautified with a painting of the precious Buddha, etc.

original: ba'i lci bas legs par sbyangs la /
analyzed: ba'i lci bas legs par sbyangs la /
translated: It should be well-prepared with cow dung.🔽Having anointed it with perfume, it should be beautified with flowers, lamps, etc.

original: dris byugs nas mtshams bzhir spod snod bzhi dang me tog dang mar me la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la /
analyzed: dris byugs nas mtshams bzhir spod snod bzhi dang me tog dang mar me la sogs pas nye bar mdzes par byas la /
translated: in the four corners, and with four perfume-burners.

original: sa la lag pas reg par bya ste /
analyzed: sa la lag pas reg par bya ste /
translated: One should touch the ground with one's hand

original: h'um bzhi dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: h'um bzhi dang yi ge brgya pa lan bdun yongs su bzlas par bya'o //
translated: and recite the four HŪM-s and the hundred-syllable mantra seven times.

original: de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing dris byugs la gos dang stod g-yogs sngon po bgos @83b shing sems dpa'i gtsug tor dang / me tog gi phreng ba btags pa kha dri zhim par bya ba dang / gdu bu dang / rna cha la sogs pas brgyan par byas la /
analyzed: de nas bdag nyid khrus byas shing dris byugs la gos dang stod g-yogs sngon po bgos @83b shing sems dpa'i gtsug tor dang / me tog gi phreng ba btags pa kha dri zhim par bya ba dang / gdu bu dang / rna cha la sogs pas brgyan par byas la /
translated: Then, having bathed oneself, anointed oneself with perfume, put on blue garments and a blue shawl, and tied on a bodhisattva's uṣṇīṣa and a flower garland, having made one's mouth fragrant, and having adorned oneself with bracelets, earrings, etc.,

original: zla ba'i nya nas phyi ma'i nya'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya ba'am /
analyzed: zla ba'i nya nas phyi ma'i nya'i bar du dkyil 'khor gyi las bya ba'am /
translated: one should perform the mandala rite from the full moon of the month up to the next full moon,

original: yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsam pa'am /
analyzed: yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig nas brtsam pa'am /
translated: or beginning on the first day of the waxing moon,

original: de bzhin du tshes brgyad dam dgu'am bcu'am bcu gsum mam /
analyzed: de bzhin du tshes brgyad dam dgu'am bcu'am bcu gsum mam /
translated: Likewise, one should begin on the eighth, ninth, tenth, thirteenth,

original: bcu bzhi la brtsams nas nya'i bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: bcu bzhi la brtsams nas nya'i bar bya ba'am /
translated: fourteenth, or fifteenth day of the lunar month,

original: snga dro'i dus nas brtsams te bya'o //
analyzed: snga dro'i dus nas brtsams te bya'o //
translated: or one should begin in the morning.

original: gal te nus par gyur na ni smyung bar bya'o //
analyzed: gal te nus par gyur na ni smyung bar bya'o //
translated: If one is able, one should fast.

original: 'on te ma nus na de'i tshe rdo rje chos yongs su bzlas ba'i spos chus bsangs pa'i dkar gsum bza' bar bya ste /
analyzed: 'on te ma nus na de'i tshe rdo rje chos yongs su bzlas ba'i spos chus bsangs pa'i dkar gsum bza' bar bya ste /
translated: But if one is not able, then one should eat the three white foods that have been blessed by the water of the vase of Vajradharma, which has been enchanted with the mantra of Vajradharma.

original: spyan 'dren pa'i zhag smyung bar gnas pa'am /
analyzed: spyan 'dren pa'i zhag smyung bar gnas pa'am /
translated: One should fast on the day of the invitation,🔽or one should rely on food that is in accord with the Dharma.

original: chos dang ldan pa'i zas la brten par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
analyzed: chos dang ldan pa'i zas la brten par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so //
translated: Thus has the Blessed One, the Vajra Holder, taught.

original: de la re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
analyzed: de la re zhig dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su 'dug la /
translated: There, one should sit in the center of the maṇḍala site,

original: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs gzhom pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du bya'o //
translated: and one should destroy the obstructors and so forth, just as before.

original: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas de bzhin du dkyil 'khor sprul la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas de bzhin du dkyil 'khor sprul la /
translated: Then, with the mudrā of the vajra wheel, one should emanate the maṇḍala just as before.

original: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang khang ba brtsegs pa dang / gdan rnams bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
analyzed: phyag bya ba la sogs pa sngon du 'gro bas sdom pa bzung nas lha'i rnal 'byor dang khang ba brtsegs pa dang / gdan rnams bskyed la dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i dbus su sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis 'dug la /
translated: Having taken up the vows with the preliminaries of homage and so forth, one should generate the deity yoga, the mansion, and the seats, and sit in the cross-legged sattva posture in the center of the maṇḍala ground.

original: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o //🔽deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
analyzed: bdag nyid spro ba bskyed par bya'o // deng du bdag tshe 'bras bu yod //
translated: One should generate enthusiasm,🔽thinking, “Today my life has become fruitful.

original: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas //🔽lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
analyzed: bdag gi gson pa'ang 'bras bur bcas // lha dang dam tshig gis mnyam par //
translated: Today my life has become fruitful.

original: gyur par bdag nyid som nyi med //
analyzed: gyur par bdag nyid som nyi med //
translated: I have no doubt that I am equal to the deity and the pledge.

original: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
analyzed: byang chub sems dang sems gcig las //
translated: From the single thought of bodhicitta,

original: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
analyzed: mi ldog par ni bdag gyur te //
translated: I have become irreversible.🔽I have no doubt that today I am born

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni //🔽deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su ni // deng bdag skye bar the tshom med //
translated: into the family of the tathāgatas.

original: deng bdag nyid ma dam pa ste //
analyzed: deng bdag nyid ma dam pa ste //
translated: Today I am the best of the self-born,

original: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
analyzed: bdag gi mchod sbyin bla na med //
translated: my offering and giving is unsurpassed.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren pas //
translated: Since I invite all buddhas,

original: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
analyzed: deng bdag 'dus pa'i mchog yin no //
translated: today I am the best of assemblies.”

original: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la spos snod lag tu thogs te /
analyzed: de nas yan lag thams cad kyis phyag byas la spos snod lag tu thogs te /
translated: Then, having prostrated with all limbs, one should hold a censer in one's hand,

original: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o //🔽ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o // ma lus phyogs na bzhugs pa yi //
translated: and invite all the Buddhas.

original: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
analyzed: sangs rgyas thams cad dgongs su gsol //
translated: All you Buddhas dwelling in the endless directions,🔽think of me!

original: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
analyzed: bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba yis //
translated: I, named so-and-so,

original: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
analyzed: rdo rje can gyi dkyil 'khor bri //
translated: will draw the mandala of the Vajra-holder.

original: deng 'dir @84a * //
analyzed: deng 'dir @84a * //
translated: Today here

original: sangs rgyas kun gshegs te /
analyzed: sangs rgyas kun gshegs te /
translated: all the Buddhas have come,

original: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
analyzed: dngos grub 'di ni stsal du gsol //
translated: and I request the bestowal of this spiritual power.

original: de'i rjes la sngar bshad pa'i rim pas de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de'i rjes la sngar bshad pa'i rim pas de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin gsum bsgom par bya'o //
translated: After that, one should meditate on the three samadhis in the same way as previously explained.🔽Then,

original: de nas / de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
analyzed: de nas / de nyid kyis ni rdo rje gzung //
translated: one should hold the vajra with that [ring finger],

original: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
analyzed: chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya //
translated: and ring the bell of Dharma.

original: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
analyzed: dam tshig gi ni phyag rgya cher //
translated: Having consecrated the great seal of the pledge,

original: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
analyzed: byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzla //
translated: one should recite the essence mantra.

original: de ltar dam tshig gsum mchog tu thob pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas /
analyzed: de ltar dam tshig gsum mchog tu thob pa'i slob dpon gyis rang gi phyag rgyas /
translated: In this way, the master who has attained the supreme three pledges, with his own seal,

original: 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga ni //
analyzed: 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga ni //
translated: the ritual of all the mandalas,

original: rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pas bya //🔽dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub byed pa'i //

analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal na /
translated: If all the Tathagatas command,🔽 then all the Tathagatas should command what should be done with these people.

original: mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
analyzed: mi 'di rnams ji ltar bgyi ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsol cig / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'dus nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
translated: Then all the Tathagatas gathered together and said this:

original: aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a ma da lam /
analyzed: aom badzra p'a ni ma h'a ma da lam /
translated: Oṃ vajra-pāṇi mahā-mudra

original: pra be sha ya sarbam dusht'am ro tran ni ba ra ya ba be bya /
analyzed: pra be sha ya sarbam dusht'am ro tran ni ba ra ya ba be bya /
translated: praveśaya sarva-duṣṭa-roṣaṇa-nivaraṇa-vaśaṃ

original: pra mo kasha ya dur drishta parya bandha bi sho dha ya n'a sha ya /
analyzed: pra mo kasha ya dur drishta parya bandha bi sho dha ya n'a sha ya /
translated: pramokṣaya dur-dṛṣṭi-parivandha-viśodhaya nāśaya

original: bi n'a sha ya ha ha ha ha h'um /
analyzed: bi n'a sha ya ha ha ha ha h'um /
translated: vināśaya ha ha ha ha hūṃ.

original: de ltar rjes su gnang ba thob pa dang // khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor steng du nam mkha' la bzhag nas /
analyzed: de ltar rjes su gnang ba thob pa dang // khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor steng du nam mkha' la bzhag nas /
translated: Thus, having obtained permission, with the mudrā of the conqueror of the three realms, place it in the sky above the maṇḍala,

original: de nyid kyi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: de nyid kyi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: and bless it with the nature of that.

original: phyag rgya de nyid rang gi snying gar bzhag la de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
analyzed: phyag rgya de nyid rang gi snying gar bzhag la de'i nga rgyal dang ldan pas khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing dbang ldan nas brtsams te /
translated: Placing that very seal at one's heart, endowed with the pride of that, one should look with the gaze of a wrathful one, beginning from the northeast.🔽

original: bgegs thams cad bskrad pa la brtson par bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad bskrad pa la brtson par bya'o //
translated: Having placed that seal on one's heart, one should look with the gaze of a wrathful one, endowed with its pride, and one should strive to drive away all obstructors beginning from the northeast.

original: yi ge aa @84b las rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la /
analyzed: yi ge aa @84b las rang gi rkang mthil gnyis su sna tshogs rdo rje bkod la /
translated: Having visualized a variegated vajra on both soles of one's feet from the letter A,

original: rang gi rkang mthil gyis yongs su bzung nas /
analyzed: rang gi rkang mthil gyis yongs su bzung nas /
translated: one should completely cover the soles of one's feet.

original: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te ri rab kyi steng gi bar du dkyil 'khor gyi gnas de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par mos pas h'um bzhi zlos shing /
analyzed: rlung gi dkyil 'khor nas brtsams te ri rab kyi steng gi bar du dkyil 'khor gyi gnas de rdo rje'i rang bzhin du gyur par mos pas h'um bzhi zlos shing /
translated: Reciting the four HŪMs, one should imagine that the site of the mandala, from the wind mandala up to Meru, is transformed into a vajra nature.

original: g-yas nas bskor bas 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas nas bskor bas 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should go around to the right, with the gaze of a wrathful one.

original: de nas khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / ra ba dang / rdo rje dra ba bya'o //
analyzed: de nas khro bo'i lta bas dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / ra ba dang / rdo rje dra ba bya'o //
translated: Then, with the gaze of a wrathful one, one should bind the mandala, and one should make the enclosure and the vajra net.

original: yang h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
analyzed: yang h'um zhes zlos shing rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi gzugs nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste /
translated: Again, reciting HŪM, one should emerge from the heart of all tathāgatas in the form of Vajra Hūṃkara.

original: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo la sogs pa rdo rje 'bar ba 'jigs su rung ba kun du 'khrugs pa /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo la sogs pa rdo rje 'bar ba 'jigs su rung ba kun du 'khrugs pa /
translated: The entire world realm is filled with the terrifying, blazing vajras of Vajrasattva’s wrath and so forth,

original: h'um zhes bya ba'i dgra 'jigs su rung bas lkog ma'i phyogs kun du gang ba dang / khro bo'i sku mchog gis mi g-yo ba rdo rje 'bebs ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' nas babs te /
analyzed: h'um zhes bya ba'i dgra 'jigs su rung bas lkog ma'i phyogs kun du gang ba dang / khro bo'i sku mchog gis mi g-yo ba rdo rje 'bebs ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha' nas babs te /
translated: and with the terrifying enemies of the syllable hūṃ, and with the supreme form of wrathful ones falling from the sky in the manner of vajra descent.

original: gar las byung ba'i me tog gi thal mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: gar las byung ba'i me tog gi thal mos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Having made offerings to all tathāgatas with the flower gesture arising from the dance,

original: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar g-yon brkyang pas 'dus te /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi lte bar g-yon brkyang pas 'dus te /
translated: one should gather in the center of the maṇḍala with the left leg extended.

original: bskal pa'i me dpung ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo'i tshogs 'byin pas bdud thams cad kun du skrag par bya'o /
analyzed: bskal pa'i me dpung ltar 'bar ba'i khro bo'i tshogs 'byin pas bdud thams cad kun du skrag par bya'o /
translated: One should frighten all māras with the emanation of a host of wrathful ones blazing like the fire at the time of the end of an eon.

original: de nas dga' bas yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dga' bas yongs su bskor ba'i tshul gyis shar phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: Then, one should proceed to the east in the manner of being surrounded by the retinue of the hero’s delight.

original: de nas des g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pa nyid kyis 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas des g-yon brkyang ba'i gnas pa nyid kyis 'dug la /
translated: Then, one should remain there with the left leg extended.

original: bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: bgegs thams cad bskrad par bya'o //
translated: One should drive away all the obstructors.

original: de nas gnas de nas lho phyogs su song la g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas de bzhin du bgegs rnams rjes su bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gnas de nas lho phyogs su song la g-yas brkyang ba'i gnas pas de bzhin du bgegs rnams rjes su bskrad par bya'o //
translated: Then, from that place, one should go to the south, and in the same way, one should drive away the obstructors by the extended right leg posture.

original: de nas gnas de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang / g-yon brkyang bdag gis nub phyogs su song la /
analyzed: de nas gnas de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang / g-yon brkyang bdag gis nub phyogs su song la /
translated: Then, from that place, by the extended right and left legs, one should go to the west,

original: zlum po'i 'dug stangs bcas nas de bzhin du bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
analyzed: zlum po'i 'dug stangs bcas nas de bzhin du bgegs rnams bskrad par bya'o //
translated: and, having assumed the circular sitting posture, one should drive away the obstructors in the same way.

original: de nas gnas de nas nam mkha'i khams ma lus par khyab par gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams g-yo bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis byang phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas gnas de nas nam mkha'i khams ma lus par khyab par gtogs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams g-yo bar byed pa'i rdo rje'i 'gros kyis byang phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: Then, from that place, one should go to the north by the vajra gait that pervades the entire realm of space, shaking the world systems.

original: de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang mthun pa'i rkang bstabs dang / zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / sa ga'i 'dug stangs rnams kyis bgegs rnams nges par bskrad @85a * //
analyzed: de nas g-yas brkyang ba dang mthun pa'i rkang bstabs dang / zlum po'i 'dug stangs dang / sa ga'i 'dug stangs rnams kyis bgegs rnams nges par bskrad @85a * //
translated: Then, having driven away the obstructors by the extended right leg posture, the half-circular sitting posture, and the circular sitting posture,

original: par byas nas /
analyzed: par byas nas /
translated: one should go to the east.

original: rdo rje'i 'gros kyis shar phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje'i 'gros kyis shar phyogs su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: One should go to the east with the gait of a vajra.

original: de ltar na stangs bstabs bzhis bgegs thams cad gzhom par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar na stangs bstabs bzhis bgegs thams cad gzhom par bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should conquer all obstructors with the four modes.

original: yang rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba bskor bar byas la /
analyzed: yang rdo rje'i 'gros kyis dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba bskor bar byas la /
translated: Again, one should circle the center of the maṇḍala with the gait of a vajra.

original: shar phyogs su mngon par bltas te /
analyzed: shar phyogs su mngon par bltas te /
translated: Facing east,

original: mchod nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba phur bu'i 'gros su 'gro bar bya'o //
analyzed: mchod nas dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba phur bu'i 'gros su 'gro bar bya'o //
translated: having made offerings, one should go to the center of the maṇḍala with the gait of a kīla.

original: de bzhin du gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i phur bus dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su phur bus gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i khro bo'i phur bus dkyil 'khor gyi gnas su phur bus gdab par bya'o //
translated: Similarly, one should drive in the kīla of the wrathful one called invincible in the place of the maṇḍala.

original: stangs stabs byed pa'i dus 'dir khro bo'i tshig gis h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par gdon par bya'o //
analyzed: stangs stabs byed pa'i dus 'dir khro bo'i tshig gis h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra rgyun mi 'chad par gdon par bya'o //
translated: At the time of performing the modes, one should utter the words of the wrathful one, the sound of hūṃ, without break.

original: de nas rdo rje'i 'dug stangs phyed kyis 'dug la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje'i 'dug stangs phyed kyis 'dug la /
translated: Then, sitting in half of the vajra posture,

original: aom badzra drva la aa na l'a rka h'um zhes zlos shing g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
analyzed: aom badzra drva la aa na l'a rka h'um zhes zlos shing g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bzhag nas /
translated: reciting oṃ vajra-dṛśa anala-rka hūṃ, placing the left vajra fist at the heart,

original: g-yas pas rdo rje bsor zhing bgegs rnam sla bsnun par bya'o //
analyzed: g-yas pas rdo rje bsor zhing bgegs rnam sla bsnun par bya'o //
translated: With the right hand, brandishing the vajra, one should strike the obstructors.

original: yang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs rnams bsreg pa la sogs pa bya ste /
analyzed: yang rdo rje me'i phyag rgya dang bcas pas kyang bgegs rnams bsreg pa la sogs pa bya ste /
translated: Again, with the vajra-fire gesture, one should burn the obstructors, and so on.

original: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
analyzed: h'um badzra aa na la ha na da ha pa tsa ma tha bhanydza ra na h'um phat rdo rje bsdams pa nang du bcings la /
translated: With the vajra-binding formed inside,

original: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba ltar byas la mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: sor mo rnams nang du 'bar ba ltar byas la mthe bo rdo rje ltar bsgreng ba ni rdo rje me'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: the fingers should be made to blaze inside, and the thumbs should be extended like a vajra. This is the vajra-fire gesture.

original: aom badzra ne tri bandha sar ba bight'a zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra ne tri bandha sar ba bight'a zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang ldan pas bgegs rnams bcing bar bya'o //
translated: With the mantra oṃ vajra-netra-bandha sarva-vigatāḥ, one should bind the obstructors with the gesture.

original: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste snyoms la bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i //
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams pa las mthe bong gnyis brkyang ste snyoms la bzhag pa ni rdo rje spyan dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya'i //
translated: From the vajra-binding, the two thumbs are extended and placed together. This is the gesture of the vajra-eye.

original: rdo rje bsdams par brkyang la bzhag ste /
analyzed: rdo rje bsdams par brkyang la bzhag ste /
translated: The vajra-binding is extended and placed.

original: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam sv'a h'a /
analyzed: aom badzra dri dho me bha ba raksha sarbam sv'a h'a /
translated: oṃ vajra-dṛdhā me bhava rakṣa sarvaṃ svahā.

original: zhes bya ba dang 'og bcing bar bya'o /
analyzed: zhes bya ba dang 'og bcing bar bya'o /
translated: One should bind below with this.

original: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang sngags /
analyzed: rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya dang sngags /
translated: The mudra and mantra of Vajrayakṣa:🔽Oṃ vajra yakṣa hūṃ.

original: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra yaksha h'um zhes bya ba phyag rgya dang bcas pas nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
translated: One should bind the sky with this mudra and mantra.

original: rdo rje thal mo mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje thal mo mthe bong gnyis brkyang la mdzub mo gnyis mche ba lta bur bya ba ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudra of Vajrayakṣa is made by extending the two thumbs in the vajra-folded palms and forming the two index fingers like fangs.

original: yang rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: yang rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyis rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi steng du nam mkha' bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Again, with the eyes of Vajrabhairava, one should bind the sky above Vajrayakṣa.

original: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
analyzed: aom hu lu hu lu h'um phat /
translated: Oṃ hulu hulu hūṃ phaṭ.

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la //
translated: Form the two vajra fists

original: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te /🔽mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mgal me'i 'khor lo bzhin du bskor te / mgo bo'i steng du mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du gzhag pa ni rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyan gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: and rotate them like a firebrand.🔽Place the two index fingers in the shape of hooks above the head—this is the mudra of Vajrabhairava’s eyes.

original: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar @85b bya ste ;
analyzed: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya dang bcas pas shar phyogs bcing bar @85b bya ste ;
translated: Together with the mudra of Vajroṣṇīṣa, one should bind the eastern direction.

original: aom h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
analyzed: aom h'um zhes bya ba'i sngags so //
translated: The mantra is “Oṃ hūṃ. ”

original: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing sla //
analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcing sla //
translated: The two vajra fists are easy to make.

original: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sprel /
analyzed: mthe'u chung gnyis lu gu rgyud du sprel /
translated: The two little fingers are linked like a chain,

original: mdzub mo gnyis rtse mo sbyar la bzlog ste spyi bor gzhag pa 'di ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya'o //
